trans-unit.source: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Huwa żgur li se jikkawżaw dawn li jidħlu entratura li biha se jkunu kuntenti, u tabilħaqq, Alla huwa Jafu u Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Dik [hija tant].

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Dan huwa għaliex Alla tikkawża l-lejl jidħol il-jum u jikkaġuna l-jum li jidħlu fil-lejl u għax Alla huwa Smigħ u Jaraw.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: Dan huwa għaliex Alla huwa l-Verità, u dak li huma jitolbu lill għajr lilu hija falsità, u minħabba Alla huwa l-Għoli, il-Kbir.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Inti ma tara li Alla bagħat l isfel xita mis-sema u l-earth ssir ħadra?

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Lilu tappartjeni dak li huwa fil-smewwiet u dak li huwa fuq l-earth.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Inti ma tara li Allah soġġett lilek dak kollu li huwa fuq l-art u l-bastimenti li jgħaddi mill-baħar bi kmand Tiegħu?

trans-unit.source: And He is the one who gave you life; then He causes you to die and then will [again] give you life. Indeed, mankind is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: U Hu huwa dak li ħadt ħajja;

trans-unit.source: For every religion We have appointed rites which they perform. So, [O Muhammad], let the disbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. Indeed, you are upon straight guidance.
trans-unit.target: Għal kull reliġjon Aħna maħtura riti li huma jwettqu.

trans-unit.source: And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allah is most knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: U jekk huma jikkontestaw miegħek, allura jgħidu, "Alla huwa l-aktar jafu ta 'dak li inti tagħmel.

trans-unit.source: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
trans-unit.target: Allah se imħallef bejnek fuq il-Jum ta 'Resurrection dwar dik li fuqha inti użati li jkunu differenti. "

trans-unit.source: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and earth? Indeed, that is in a Record. Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
trans-unit.target: Inti ma taf li Alla jaf dak li huwa fil-sema u art?

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority and that of which they have no knowledge. And there will not be for the wrongdoers any helper.
trans-unit.target: U huma qima minbarra Allah dik li għaliha Huwa ma bagħat l-awtorità u dik ta 'liema m'għandhom ebda għarfien.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, you recognize in the faces of those who disbelieve disapproval. They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses. Say, "Then shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire which Allah has promised those who disbelieve, and wretched is the destination."
trans-unit.target: U meta versi tagħna huma Akbah lilhom bħala evidenza ċara, inti tirrikonoxxi fl-uċuħ ta 'dawk li disbelieve diżapprovazzjoni.

trans-unit.source: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued.
trans-unit.target: nies O, eżempju huwa ppreżentat, hekk jisimgħu lilha.

trans-unit.source: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Huma ma valutata Allah ma stima veru.

trans-unit.source: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Allah jagħżel mill-messaġġiera anġli u mill-poplu.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: Jaf x'inhu [bħalissa] quddiemhom u dak li se jkun wara minnhom.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: O inti li jemmnu, pruwa u prostrate u qima Mulej tiegħek u tagħmel tajjeb - li inti tista 'tirnexxi.

trans-unit.source: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.
trans-unit.target: U jaspiraw għall Allah bil-tistinka minħabba lilu.

trans-unit.source: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
trans-unit.target: Ċertament se-fidili rnexxielhom:

trans-unit.source: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
trans-unit.target: Dawn li huma matul talb tagħhom umilment sottomessi

trans-unit.source: And they who turn away from ill speech
trans-unit.target: U huma li jduru bogħod mill diskors morda

trans-unit.source: And they who are observant of zakah
trans-unit.target: U huma li huma attent ta zakah

trans-unit.source: And they who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: U huma li gwardja partijiet privati tagħhom

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
trans-unit.target: Għajr minn nisa tagħhom jew dawk idejn dritt tagħhom jippossjedu, għall-fatt, dawn mhux se jiġi akkużat -

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: Iżda min ifittex lil hinn minn dak, allura dawk huma l-transgressors -

trans-unit.source: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive
trans-unit.target: U huma min huma l trusts tagħhom u l-wegħdiet tagħhom attenti

trans-unit.source: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
trans-unit.target: U huma li jżommu b'attenzjoni talb tagħhom -

trans-unit.source: Those are the inheritors
trans-unit.target: Dawn huma l-werrieta

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: Min se jirtu al-Firdaus.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.
trans-unit.target: U ċertament ma Noħolqu bniedem minn estratt ta 'tafal.

trans-unit.source: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Aħna mqiegħda lilu bħala sperma drop fi preżentazzjoni ditta.

trans-unit.source: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Għamilna l-isperma drop fi embolu jaqbdu, u Għamilna l-għoqda tad ġo f'daqqa [ta 'laħam], u Għamilna [minn] lf'daqqa, għadam, u Aħna koperti l-għadam bil-laħam;

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad fil-fatt, wara li inti die.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad tabilħaqq inti, dwar il-Jum ta 'Resurrection, se jkun Rxoxt.

trans-unit.source: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
trans-unit.target: U Ħloqna hawn fuq inti seba smewwiet ub'saffi, u qatt ma Aħna kienu ta 'ħolqien ta [Tagħna] konxji.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna bagħtu r xita mis-sema fl-ammont meqjus u kostanti fil-earth.

trans-unit.source: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna pproduċiex għalik biex b'hekk ġonna tas-siġar tal-palm u dwieli fejn għalik huma frott abbundanti u minn fejn int tiekol.

trans-unit.source: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.
trans-unit.target: U [Aħna pproduċiex] a tal-ħruġ siġra minn Mount Sinai li tipproduċi żejt u l-ikel għal dawk li jieklu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: U fil-fatt, għal int fl-annimali hija lezzjoni.

trans-unit.source: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: U fuqhom u fuq vapuri li qed jinġarru.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: U Kellna ċertament mibgħuta Noah lill-poplu tiegħu, u hu qal, "O poplu tiegħi, qima Allah, inti għandek l-ebda diety għajr lilu;? Allura se inti ma biża lilu"

trans-unit.source: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.
trans-unit.target: Iżda l-eminenti fost dawk li disbelieved minn poplu tiegħu qal, "Din mhix iżda raġel bħal infuskom li jixtieq li jieħu preċedenza fuq inti u jekk Alla kien willed [li tibgħat messaġġier], Hu kien bagħat l-anġli Aħna.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
trans-unit.target: Huwa mhux iżda raġel ipposseduti bil dimenzja, hekk stenna tikkonċernah għal żmien. "

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: [Noah] qal, "Mulej tiegħi, appoġġ me minħabba li jkunu miċħuda lili."

trans-unit.source: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
trans-unit.target: Allura Aħna ispirati lilu, "Ibni il-vapur taħt osservazzjoni tagħna, u l-ispirazzjoni tagħna, u meta l-ħakma tagħna ġejja u l-tifwir forn, tpoġġi fuq il-bastiment minn kull [kreatura] żewġ mates u l-familja tiegħek, ħlief dawk li għalihom id-digriet [

trans-unit.source: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
trans-unit.target: U meta inti jkunu telgħu fuq il-vapur, inti u dawk miegħek, allura jgħidu, "tifħir lil Alla li ffranka lilna mill-poplu illeċti."

trans-unit.source: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
trans-unit.target: U jgħidu, "Mulej tiegħi, let me jillandja f'post żbark mbierka, u Inti l-aqwa biex jakkomodaw [lilna]."

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq f'dak huma sinjali, u tabilħaqq, Aħna dejjem ittestjar [impjegati tagħna].

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Aħna prodotta wara minnhom ġenerazzjoni ta 'oħrajn.

trans-unit.source: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: U Aħna bagħtet fosthom messaġġier minn infushom, [qal], "Qima Allah, inti għandek l-ebda diety għajr lilu;? Allura se inti ma biża lilu"

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.
trans-unit.target: U l-eminenti fost in-nies tiegħu li disbelieved u ċaħad l-laqgħa tal-Minn hawn filwaqt Kellna tahom lussu fil-ħajja worldly qal, "Din mhix iżda raġel bħal infuskom. Huwa jiekol ta 'dak minn fejn tiekol u xorb ta' dak li

trans-unit.source: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
trans-unit.target: U jekk inti għandek jobdu raġel bħal infuskom, tabilħaqq, inti mbagħad tkun telliefa.

trans-unit.source: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?
trans-unit.target: Ma hu wegħda li meta inti mietu u saru trab u għadam li inti ser tkun pproduċiex [darba aktar]?

trans-unit.source: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Kemm, kemm, huwa dak li inti qed imwiegħed.

trans-unit.source: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Ħajja mhix iżda l-ħajja worldly tagħna - aħna die u jgħixu, iżda aħna mhux se tkun resurrected.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."
trans-unit.target: Huwa mhux iżda raġel li vvinta jimteddu dwar Alla, u aħna mhux se jemmnu lilu. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: Huwa qal, "Mulej tiegħi, appoġġ me minħabba li jkunu miċħuda lili."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] qal, "Wara ftit, dawn żgur li se jsiru dispjaċir."

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Allura l-shriek maqbuda fil-verità, u Għamilna bħala qasbija [impjant].

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them other generations.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Aħna prodotta wara minnhom ġenerazzjonijiet oħra.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].
trans-unit.target: Nru nazzjon se jippreċedi żmien tagħha [tat-terminazzjoni], lanqas m'huma se jibqgħu [wara].

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Aħna mibgħuta messaġġiera tagħna wara xulxin.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Aħna mibgħuta Mosè u ħuh Aron tiegħu ma 'sinjali tagħna u awtorità ċar

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.
trans-unit.target: Biex pharaoh u l-istabbiliment tiegħu, imma dawn kienu arroganti u kienu nies haughty.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"
trans-unit.target: Huma qalu, "Jekk aħna nemmnu żewġ irġiel simili lilna nfusna filwaqt li persuni tagħhom huma għalina fil servitù?"

trans-unit.source: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Allura dawn miċħuda lilhom u kienu ta 'dawk meqruda.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna żgur taw Mose l-Iskrittura li forsi huma jkunu ggwidati.

trans-unit.source: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna għamlet l-iben ta 'Marija u ommu sinjal u protett fi ħdan [l-oqsma] u l-ilma jiċċirkola art għolja li livell.

trans-unit.source: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.
trans-unit.target: [Allah qal], "messaġġiera O, jieklu mill-ikel tajba u t-tjieba xogħol. Tabilħaqq, I, ta 'dak li inti tagħmel, am Jafu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: U fil-fatt dan, ir-reliġjon tiegħek, huwa reliġjon waħda, u jiena Mulej tiegħek, hekk biża Me. "

trans-unit.source: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Imma l-poplu maqsuma reliġjon tagħhom bejniethom fis settet - kull fazzjoni, fil dak li għandha, rejoicing.

trans-unit.source: So leave them in their confusion for a time.
trans-unit.target: Allura jħallu lilhom fil-konfużjoni tagħhom għal żmien.

trans-unit.source: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
trans-unit.target: Do jaħsbu li dak li Aħna jestendu lilhom ta 'ġid u t-tfal

trans-unit.source: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Huwa [minħabba] Aħna iħaffu għalihom affarijiet tajbin?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, huma min huma jibżgħu mill-biża 'Lord tagħhom

trans-unit.source: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord
trans-unit.target: U huma li jemmnu fil-sinjali ta 'Lord tagħhom

trans-unit.source: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
trans-unit.target: U dawn li ma jassoċjaw xejn ma 'Lord tagħhom

trans-unit.source: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -
trans-unit.target: U huma li jagħtu dak li jagħtu filwaqt qlub tagħhom huma beżgħana minħabba li dawn se jirritorna lil Lord tagħhom -

trans-unit.source: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
trans-unit.target: Huwa dawk li iħaffu li atti tajba, u dawn tiskorri [ħaddieħor] fih.

trans-unit.source: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna jitolbu mhux ruħ ħlief [ma 'dik fi ħdan] il-kapaċità tagħha, u ma Us huwa rekord li titkellem bil-verità;

trans-unit.source: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,
trans-unit.target: Iżda qlub tagħhom huma koperti bil-konfużjoni dwar dan, u dawn għandhom [ħażen] atti minbarra disbelief li jkunu qed jagħmlu,

trans-unit.source: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.
trans-unit.target: Sal meta Aħna jaħtfu dawk sinjuri tagħhom ma kastig, f'daqqa huma biki [li Allah] għall-għajnuna.

trans-unit.source: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: M'għandekx cry out illum.

trans-unit.source: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
trans-unit.target: versi tiegħi kienu diġà ġew Akbah lilek, imma inti kienu ddawwar lura fuq tkaken tiegħek

trans-unit.source: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.
trans-unit.target: Fil arroganza dwar dan, conversing bil-lejl, taħdit ħażen.

trans-unit.source: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad ma dawn mhumiex riflessi fuq l-Qur'an, jew ikollu hemm jiġu lilhom dak li ma kinux jaslu għal forefathers tagħhom?

trans-unit.source: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?
trans-unit.target: Jew ma huma ma jafu Messenger tagħhom, u għalhekk huma lejn lilu disacknowledging?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.
trans-unit.target: Jew do jgħidu, "Fil lilu huwa dimenzja?"

trans-unit.source: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Iżda jekk il-Verità kienet segwiet inklinazzjonijiet tagħhom, l-smewwiet u l-earth u min hu fihom kien ikun ruined.

trans-unit.source: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: Jew għandek, [O Muhammad], jistaqsihom għal ħlas?

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: U fil-fatt, inti tistedinhom biex triq dritta.

trans-unit.source: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
trans-unit.target: Iżda fil-fatt, dawk li ma jemmnu fil-Minn hawn qed jiddevjaw mill-perkors.

trans-unit.source: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: U anki jekk aħna tawhom ħniena u mneħħija dak li kien fuqhom ta affliction, huma ser ikompli fil trasgressjoni tagħhom, wandering bl-addoċċ.

trans-unit.source: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
trans-unit.target: U Kellna ħakem bl tbatija [bħala twissija], iżda dawn ma taw lil Lord tagħhom, u lanqas ma huma umilment supplicate, [u se jkompli b'hekk]

trans-unit.source: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.
trans-unit.target: Sal meta Ftaħna quddiemhom bieb ta 'piena severa, immedjatament dawn se jkunu fihom fil-disperazzjoni.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li pproduċiet għalik smigħ u viżjoni u qlub;

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li jkun immultiplikat inti matul l-earth, u lilu inti ser tinġabar.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li jagħti l-ħajja u l-kawżi tal-mewt, u tiegħu huwa l alternazzjoni tal-lejl u l-jum.

trans-unit.source: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.
trans-unit.target: Pjuttost, huma jgħidu bħal dak il-popli ta 'qabel qal.

trans-unit.source: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: Huma qalu, "Meta aħna mietu u saru trab u għadam, aħna fil-fatt li jiġu Rxoxt?

trans-unit.source: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Ġejna imwiegħda dan, aħna u forefathers tagħna, qabel;

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Say, [O Muhammad], "Lil min jappartjeni l-art u kull min ikun fiha, jekk inti għandek tkun taf?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"
trans-unit.target: Huma se ngħid, "Biex Allah."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"
trans-unit.target: Say, "Min hu Mulej mis-seba smewwiet u Lord tal-tron Kbir?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Huma se ngħid, "[Dawn jappartjenu] li Allah."

trans-unit.source: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Say, "Fil li idejn huwa l-isfera ta 'l-affarijiet kollha - u Hu jipproteġi filwaqt li xejn ma jistgħu jipproteġu kontra lilu -? Jekk inti għandek tkun taf"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"
trans-unit.target: Huma se ngħid, "[All jappartjeni] li Allah."

trans-unit.source: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.
trans-unit.target: Pjuttost, Aħna ġabu magħhom il-verità, u tabilħaqq huma liars.

trans-unit.source: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].
trans-unit.target: Allah ma tkunx ħadet iben, u lanqas ma hemm qatt kien miegħu xi diety.

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].
trans-unit.target: [Huwa] knower tal-tidhirx u l rat, hekk għolja hija Hu hinn minn dak li jassoċjaw [miegħu].

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
trans-unit.target: Say, [O Muhammad], "Mulej tiegħi, jekk Għandek urini dak li jiġu mwiegħda,

trans-unit.source: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: Lord tiegħi, allura ma tqiegħed lili fost il-poplu illeċti. "

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.
trans-unit.target: U fil-fatt, Aħna kapaċi biex turi li inti dak li għandna imwiegħed lilhom.

trans-unit.source: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Jirripellaw, minn [permezz ta '] x'inhu l-aħjar, ħażen [tagħhom].

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
trans-unit.target: U jgħidu, "Mulej tiegħi, I ifittxu kenn fil inti mill-espressjonijiet li jħajru tal-xjaten,

trans-unit.source: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."
trans-unit.target: U jien tfittex kenn fil Int, Mulej tiegħi, lest huma jkunu preżenti miegħi. "

trans-unit.source: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back
trans-unit.target: [Għal tali huwa l-istat ta 'l-disbelievers], sal meta mewt niġu għal waħda minnhom, huwa jgħid, "Mulej tiegħi, tibgħatli lura

trans-unit.source: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.
trans-unit.target: .! I tista 'tagħmel tjieba fil dak li tlaqt lura "Le Huwa biss kelma huwa qal, u warajhom huwa ostaklu sakemm il-Jum huma resurrected.

trans-unit.source: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.
trans-unit.target: Allura meta l-Qarn Jiġi minfuħ, l-ebda relazzjoni se jkun hemm bejniethom li Jum, lanqas m'huma se jistaqsi dwar xulxin.

trans-unit.source: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li l-iskali huma tqal [ma atti tajba] - huwa huma li huma l-suċċess.

trans-unit.source: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Iżda dawk li iskali huma ħfief - dawk huma dawk li tilfu erwieħ tagħhom, [huma] fl-infern, jobdu eternally.

trans-unit.source: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
trans-unit.target: Il Nar ser sear uċuħ tagħhom, u dawn fihom se jkollhom tbissim stirat.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
trans-unit.target: [Se jingħad].

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.
trans-unit.target: Huma se ngħid, "Mulej tagħna, wretchedness tagħna għelbu magħna, u aħna kienu nies astray.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Mulej tagħna, neħħi lilna minnha, u jekk konna biex jirritorna [lill ħażen], irridu tassew ikun kontraventuri. "

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
trans-unit.target: Huwa se ngħid, "Jibqgħu despised fih u ma jitkellmu ma Me.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, kien hemm parti ta 'impjegati tiegħi li qal, "Mulej tagħna, aħna għandna jemmnu, hekk nahfru lilna u jkollhom ħniena magħna, u Inti l-aqwa tal-ħniena."

trans-unit.source: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.
trans-unit.target: Imma inti ħadithom fil mockery sal-punt li huma jkunu għamlu tinsa tifkira tiegħi, u inti użati biex tidħaq lilhom.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, jien ppremjati minnhom dan il-Jum għall-paċenzja meħtieġa tagħhom - li huma l-attainers [ta 'suċċess] ".

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] se ngħid, "Kemm ma inti tibqa fuq l-art fl-għadd ta 'snin?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."
trans-unit.target: Huma se ngħid, "Aħna baqgħu kuljum jew f'parti ta 'jum; titlob lil dawk li tenumera."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
trans-unit.target: Huwa se ngħid, "Inti qagħdu le iżda ftit - jekk biss kellek magħrufa.

trans-unit.source: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad ma taħseb li Ħloqna inti inutilment u li to us inti ma tkunx mibgħuta lura? "

trans-unit.source: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.
trans-unit.target: Allura exalted huwa Allah, il-Sovran, il-Verità;

trans-unit.source: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: U min jinvoka barra minn hekk Allah diety oħra li għaliha ma jkollu ebda prova - allura kont tiegħu hu biss ma 'Lord tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: U, [O Muhammad], ngħidu aħna, "Mulej tiegħi, nahfru u jkollhom ħniena, u Inti l-aqwa tal-ħniena."

trans-unit.source: [This is] a surah which We have sent down and made [that within it] obligatory and revealed therein verses of clear evidence that you might remember.
trans-unit.target: [Dan huwa] a Surah li Aħna bagħtu stabbiliti u magħmula [li fi ħdanha] obbligatorja u wera fihom versi ta 'evidenza ċara li inti tista tiftakar.

trans-unit.source: The [unmarried] woman or [unmarried] man found guilty of sexual intercourse - lash each one of them with a hundred lashes, and do not be taken by pity for them in the religion of Allah, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. And let a group of the believers witness their punishment.
trans-unit.target: Il- [mhux miżżewweġ] mara jew [mhux miżżewweġ] raġel instab ħati ta 'kopulazzjoni sesswali - torbot kull wieħed minnhom bil mitt lashes, u ma tittieħed mill ħasra għalihom fil-reliġjon ta' Allah, jekk għandek temmen fil Allah u l-Aħħar

trans-unit.source: The fornicator does not marry except a [female] fornicator or polytheist, and none marries her except a fornicator or a polytheist, and that has been made unlawful to the believers.
trans-unit.target: Il fornicator ma jiżżewġu ħlief fornicator [femminili] jew polytheist, u ħadd jiżżewweġ tagħha ħlief fornicator jew polytheist, u li sar illegali lill-fidili.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse chaste women and then do not produce four witnesses - lash them with eighty lashes and do not accept from them testimony ever after. And those are the defiantly disobedient,
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jakkużana nisa chaste u mbagħad ma jipproduċux erba 'xhieda - torbot bl lashes tmenin u ma jaċċettawx minnhom xhieda qatt wara.

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent thereafter and reform, for indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ħlief għal dawk li jindem wara u r-riforma, għall-fatt, Alla huwa klementi u ħniena.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse their wives [of adultery] and have no witnesses except themselves - then the witness of one of them [shall be] four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jakkużana nisa tagħhom [b'adulterju] u jkollhom l-ebda xhieda għajr infushom - allura l-xhieda ta 'wieħed minnhom [għandhom ikunu] erba' testimonjanzi [ġurament] billi Alla li fil-fatt, huwa jkun ta 'l-veritiera.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the curse of Allah be upon him if he should be among the liars.
trans-unit.target: U l-ħames [urament se jkun] li l-saħta ta 'Allah jiġu lilu jekk huwa għandu jkun fost il-liars.

trans-unit.source: But it will prevent punishment from her if she gives four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the liars.
trans-unit.target: Iżda dawn ma jħallux piena mill tagħha jekk hi tagħti erba 'testimonjanzi [ġurament] billi Alla li fil-fatt, huwa jkun ta' l-liars.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he was of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: U l-ħames [urament se jkun] li l-rabja ta 'Alla jkun fuq tagħha jekk kien tal-veritiera.

trans-unit.source: And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Accepting of repentance and Wise.
trans-unit.target: U jekk mhux għall-favur ta 'Allah fuqkom u l-ħniena tiegħu ... u minħabba Allah huwa Taċċetta ta indiema u Wise.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who came with falsehood are a group among you. Do not think it bad for you; rather it is good for you. For every person among them is what [punishment] he has earned from the sin, and he who took upon himself the greater portion thereof - for him is a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, dawk li daħal mal falsità huma grupp fostkom.

trans-unit.source: Why, when you heard it, did not the believing men and believing women think good of one another and say, "This is an obvious falsehood"?
trans-unit.target: Għaliex, meta smajtu dan, ma l-irġiel jemmnu u n-nisa jemmen think tajba ta 'xulxin u jgħidu, "Dan huwa falsità ovvju"?

trans-unit.source: Why did they [who slandered] not produce for it four witnesses? And when they do not produce the witnesses, then it is they, in the sight of Allah, who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Għaliex ma huma [li slandered] ma jipproduċux għall huwa erba 'xhieda?

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy in this world and the Hereafter, you would have been touched for that [lie] in which you were involved by a great punishment
trans-unit.target: U li kieku ma kienx għall-favur ta 'Allah fuqkom u l-ħniena tiegħu f'din id-dinja u l-Minn hawn, inti kienu mimsus għal dak [jinsabu] fejn inti kienu involuti minn kastig kbir

trans-unit.source: When you received it with your tongues and said with your mouths that of which you had no knowledge and thought it was insignificant while it was, in the sight of Allah, tremendous.
trans-unit.target: Meta inti rċevieh bl-ilsna tiegħek u qal ma ħluq tiegħek dak li tiegħu kellek l-ebda għarfien u ħsibt li kien insinifikanti filwaqt li kien, fil-vista ta 'Allah, tremendi.

trans-unit.source: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, "It is not for us to speak of this. Exalted are You, [O Allah]; this is a great slander"?
trans-unit.target: U għaliex, meta smajtu dan, ma inti ma jgħidu, "Mhuwiex għalina li jitkellmu ta 'dan Exalted huma Inti, [O Alla];. Dan huwa malafama kbir"?

trans-unit.source: Allah warns you against returning to the likes of this [conduct], ever, if you should be believers.
trans-unit.target: Allah iwissi inti kontra jirritornaw lejn l-jħobb ta 'dan [kondotta], qatt, jekk inti għandek tkun twemmin.

trans-unit.source: And Allah makes clear to you the verses, and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: U Alla tagħmilha ċara li inti l-versi, u Allah huwa Jafu u Wise.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread [or publicized] among those who have believed will have a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, dawk li jħobbu li immoralità għandu jkun mifrux [jew ppubbliċizzati] fost dawk li kienu jemmnu se jkollhom piena uġigħ f'din id-dinja u l-Minn hawn.

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: U li kieku ma kienx għall-favur ta 'Allah fuqkom u l-ħniena tiegħu ... u għaliex Alla huwa Tip u ħniena.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not follow the footsteps of Satan. And whoever follows the footsteps of Satan - indeed, he enjoins immorality and wrongdoing. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever, but Allah purifies whom He wills, and Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: O inti li jemmnu, ma jsegwux il-passi ta 'Satana.

trans-unit.source: And let not those of virtue among you and wealth swear not to give [aid] to their relatives and the needy and the emigrants for the cause of Allah, and let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: U ejja ma dawk ta 'saħħa fostkom u l-ġid naħlef mhux li tagħti [għajnuna] għall-qraba tagħhom u l-bżonn u l-emigranti għas-kawża ta' Allah, u ħallihom maħfra u jinjoraw.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who [falsely] accuse chaste, unaware and believing women are cursed in this world and the Hereafter; and they will have a great punishment
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, dawk li [falz] takkuża chaste, konxji u jemmen nisa huma misħuta f'din id-dinja u l-Minn hawn;

trans-unit.source: On a Day when their tongues, their hands and their feet will bear witness against them as to what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Fuq Jum meta ilsna tagħhom, idejn u bla saqajn tagħhom se jixhdu kontrihom dwar dak li huma użati biex jagħmlu.

trans-unit.source: That Day, Allah will pay them in full their deserved recompense, and they will know that it is Allah who is the perfect in justice.
trans-unit.target: Dik Jum, Allah se jħallashom għal kollox rikompens jixirqilhom tagħhom, u huma jkunu jafu li huwa Allah min huwa l-perfetta fil-ġustizzja.

trans-unit.source: Evil words are for evil men, and evil men are [subjected] to evil words. And good words are for good men, and good men are [an object] of good words. Those [good people] are declared innocent of what the slanderers say. For them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: Kliem ħażen huma għall-irġiel ħażen, u l-irġiel ħażen qed [soġġetti] għall-kliem ħażen.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not enter houses other than your own houses until you ascertain welcome and greet their inhabitants. That is best for you; perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: O inti li jemmnu, ma jidħlux djar apparti minn djar tiegħek sakemm inti tivverifika milqugħa u greet abitanti tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: And if you do not find anyone therein, do not enter them until permission has been given you. And if it is said to you, "Go back," then go back; it is purer for you. And Allah is Knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: U jekk inti ma ssibx xi ħadd hemmhekk, ma jidħlux lilhom sakemm permess ikun tak.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon you for entering houses not inhabited in which there is convenience for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: M'hemm l-ebda ħtija fuqkom biex tiddaħħal djar mhux abitati fejn ikun hemm konvenjenza għalik.

trans-unit.source: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what they do.
trans-unit.target: Għid l-irġiel jemmnu li tnaqqas [wħud] ta 'viżjoni tagħhom u gwardja partijiet privati tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: And tell the believing women to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts and not expose their adornment except that which [necessarily] appears thereof and to wrap [a portion of] their headcovers over their chests and not expose their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no physical desire, or children who are not yet aware of the private aspects of women. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment. And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers, that you might succeed.
trans-unit.target: U għid il-nisa jemmen li tnaqqas [wħud] ta 'viżjoni tagħhom u gwardja partijiet privati tagħhom u tesponix tiżjin tagħhom għajr dak li [neċessarjament] tidher tiegħu u biex nagħlaq [porzjon ta] headcovers tagħhom fuq sniedaq tagħhom u tesponix tiżjin tagħhom ħlief

trans-unit.source: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves. If they should be poor, Allah will enrich them from His bounty, and Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: U jiżżewġu l mhux miżżewġa fostkom u l twajbin fost skjavi maskili tiegħek u skjavi nisa.

trans-unit.source: But let them who find not [the means for] marriage abstain [from sexual relations] until Allah enriches them from His bounty. And those who seek a contract [for eventual emancipation] from among whom your right hands possess - then make a contract with them if you know there is within them goodness and give them from the wealth of Allah which He has given you. And do not compel your slave girls to prostitution, if they desire chastity, to seek [thereby] the temporary interests of worldly life. And if someone should compel them, then indeed, Allah is [to them], after their compulsion, Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Iżda jħallu lilhom li jsibu ma [l-mezzi for] żwieġ jastjenu [mir-relazzjonijiet sesswali] sakemm Allah ssebbaħ milli Bounty Tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly sent down to you distinct verses and examples from those who passed on before you and an admonition for those who fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ċertament bagħtu stabbiliti lilek versi distinti u eżempji minn dawk li mgħoddija qabel int u anfira għal dawk li jibżgħu Allah.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it were a pearly [white] star lit from [the oil of] a blessed olive tree, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. Allah guides to His light whom He wills. And Allah presents examples for the people, and Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Alla huwa l-Dawl tal-franki u l-earth.

trans-unit.source: [Such niches are] in mosques which Allah has ordered to be raised and that His name be mentioned therein; exalting Him within them in the morning and the evenings
trans-unit.target: [Dawn niċeċ huma] fir moskej li Allah ordna li jitqajmu u li Ismu jiġu msemmija fihom;

trans-unit.source: [Are] men whom neither commerce nor sale distracts from the remembrance of Allah and performance of prayer and giving of zakah. They fear a Day in which the hearts and eyes will [fearfully] turn about -
trans-unit.target: [Huma]-irġiel ngħatawx la kummerċ u lanqas bejgħ distracts mill-tifkira ta 'Allah u l-prestazzjoni ta' talb u jagħtu tat zakah.

trans-unit.source: That Allah may reward them [according to] the best of what they did and increase them from His bounty. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account.
trans-unit.target: Dak Allah jista jippremjahom [skond l] l-aħjar ta 'x'għamlu u jżidu milli Bounty Tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieved - their deeds are like a mirage in a lowland which a thirsty one thinks is water until, when he comes to it, he finds it is nothing but finds Allah before Him, and He will pay him in full his due; and Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Iżda dawk li disbelieved - atti tagħhom huma bħal Mirage fil-pjanura fejn waħda għatx jaħseb hija l-ilma sakemm, meta huwa jgħaddi lilu, isib huwa xejn imma jsib Allah quddiemu u Hu se tħallas lilu bis-sħiħ dovut tiegħu;

trans-unit.source: Or [they are] like darknesses within an unfathomable sea which is covered by waves, upon which are waves, over which are clouds - darknesses, some of them upon others. When one puts out his hand [therein], he can hardly see it. And he to whom Allah has not granted light - for him there is no light.
trans-unit.target: Jew [huma] bħal darknesses fi ħdan baħar lanqas tista fejn huwa kopert minn mewġ, li fuqhom huma mewġ, li fuqha huma sħab - darknesses, uħud minnhom fuq ħaddieħor.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah is exalted by whomever is within the heavens and the earth and [by] the birds with wings spread [in flight]? Each [of them] has known his [means of] prayer and exalting [Him], and Allah is Knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: Inti ma tara li Alla hija exalted minn kull min waħħal huwa fi ħdan l-smewwiet u l-earth u [mill]-għasafar bil-ġwienaħ mifruxa [waqt it-titjira]?

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination.
trans-unit.target: U li Allah tappartjeni l-dominion tal-franki u l-earth, u li Allah hija d-destinazzjoni.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah drives clouds? Then He brings them together, then He makes them into a mass, and you see the rain emerge from within it. And He sends down from the sky, mountains [of clouds] within which is hail, and He strikes with it whom He wills and averts it from whom He wills. The flash of its lightening almost takes away the eyesight.
trans-unit.target: Inti ma tara li Alla drives sħab?

trans-unit.source: Allah alternates the night and the day. Indeed in that is a lesson for those who have vision.
trans-unit.target: Allah sostituti il-lejl u l-jum.

trans-unit.source: Allah has created every [living] creature from water. And of them are those that move on their bellies, and of them are those that walk on two legs, and of them are those that walk on four. Allah creates what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Allah ħoloq kull [għajxien] kreatura mill-ilma.

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down distinct verses. And Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Aħna ċertament bagħtu r versi distinti.

trans-unit.source: But the hypocrites say, "We have believed in Allah and in the Messenger, and we obey"; then a party of them turns away after that. And those are not believers.
trans-unit.target: Iżda l-hypocrites jgħidu, "Aħna emmnu Allah u fil-Messenger, u aħna jobdu";

trans-unit.source: And when they are called to [the words of] Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, at once a party of them turns aside [in refusal].
trans-unit.target: U meta jkunu msejħa biex [-kliem ta '] Allah u Messenger Tiegħu biex jiġġudikaw bejniethom, f'daqqa parti minnhom dawriet twarrib [fl rifjut].

trans-unit.source: But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience.
trans-unit.target: Iżda jekk id-dritt huwa tagħhom, dawn jaqgħu lilu ubbidjenza pront.

trans-unit.source: Is there disease in their hearts? Or have they doubted? Or do they fear that Allah will be unjust to them, or His Messenger? Rather, it is they who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Hemm marda fil-qlub tagħhom?

trans-unit.source: The only statement of the [true] believers when they are called to Allah and His Messenger to judge between them is that they say, "We hear and we obey." And those are the successful.
trans-unit.target: L-unika dikjarazzjoni tat-twemmin [veru] meta jkunu qed msejħa biex Allah u Messenger Tiegħu biex jiġġudikaw bejniethom hi li jgħidu, "Aħna nisimgħu u aħna jobdu."

trans-unit.source: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger and fears Allah and is conscious of Him - it is those who are the attainers.
trans-unit.target: U min tobdi Alla u Messenger Tiegħu u jibża Allah u hija konxja tal Him - huwa dawk li huma l-attainers.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths that if you ordered them, they would go forth [in Allah 's cause]. Say, "Do not swear. [Such] obedience is known. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with that which you do."
trans-unit.target: U huma naħlef mill Allah ġuramenti aktar qawwija tagħhom li jekk inti ordnat lilhom, dawn se jmorru lura [fir-kawża tal Allah].

trans-unit.source: Say, "Obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon him is only that [duty] with which he has been charged, and upon you is that with which you have been charged. And if you obey him, you will be [rightly] guided. And there is not upon the Messenger except the [responsibility for] clear notification."
trans-unit.target: Say, "Jobdu Allah u jobdu l Messenger;. Imma jekk inti dawran bogħod - imbagħad lilu biss li [dazju] miegħu jkun ġie akkużat, u fuqkom huwa li magħhom inti kellha tinġabar U jekk inti jobdu lilu,

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised those who have believed among you and done righteous deeds that He will surely grant them succession [to authority] upon the earth just as He granted it to those before them and that He will surely establish for them [therein] their religion which He has preferred for them and that He will surely substitute for them, after their fear, security, [for] they worship Me, not associating anything with Me. But whoever disbelieves after that - then those are the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Allah wiegħed lil dawk li kienu jemmnu fostkom u jsir atti twajbin li Hu żgur li se jagħtihom suċċessjoni [lill-awtorità] fuq l-art bħalma Huwa taha lil dawk quddiemhom u li Hu żgur li se jistabbilixxu għalihom [hemmhekk] reliġjon tagħhom li

trans-unit.source: And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.
trans-unit.target: U jistabbilixxu talb u jagħtu zakah u jobdu l Messenger - li inti tista 'tirċievi ħniena.

trans-unit.source: Never think that the disbelievers are causing failure [to Allah] upon the earth. Their refuge will be the Fire - and how wretched the destination.
trans-unit.target: Qatt jaħsbu li l-disbelievers qed jikkawżaw nuqqas [li Allah] fuq l-art.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not [yet] reached puberty among you ask permission of you [before entering] at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing [for rest] at noon and after the night prayer. [These are] three times of privacy for you. There is no blame upon you nor upon them beyond these [periods], for they continually circulate among you - some of you, among others. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O inti li jemmnu, let dawk li idejn dritt tiegħek jippossjedu u dawk li ma jkunux [għadhom] ntlaħaq pubertà fostkom titlob permess minnkom [qabel ma jidħlu] fi tliet darbiet: qabel l-talb bidunett u meta inti twarrab ilbies tiegħek [għall

trans-unit.source: And when the children among you reach puberty, let them ask permission [at all times] as those before them have done. Thus does Allah make clear to you His verses; and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: U meta t-tfal fost inti tilħaq l-pubertà, ħallihom titlob permess [fil-ħinijiet kollha] bħal dawk quddiemhom għamlu.

trans-unit.source: And women of post-menstrual age who have no desire for marriage - there is no blame upon them for putting aside their outer garments [but] not displaying adornment. But to modestly refrain [from that] is better for them. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: U n-nisa ta 'età post-menstrwali li jkollhom ebda xewqa għaż-żwieġ - m'hemm l-ebda ħtija fuqhom għat-tqegħid aside lbies ta' barra tagħhom [iżda] ma jurix tiżjin.

trans-unit.source: There is not upon the blind [any] constraint nor upon the lame constraint nor upon the ill constraint nor upon yourselves when you eat from your [own] houses or the houses of your fathers or the houses of your mothers or the houses of your brothers or the houses of your sisters or the houses of your father's brothers or the houses of your father's sisters or the houses of your mother's brothers or the houses of your mother's sisters or [from houses] whose keys you possess or [from the house] of your friend. There is no blame upon you whether you eat together or separately. But when you enter houses, give greetings of peace upon each other - a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Thus does Allah make clear to you the verses [of ordinance] that you may understand.
trans-unit.target: Ma hemmx lill-restrizzjoni għomja [xi] u lanqas fuq ir-restrizzjoni lame u lanqas fuq ir-restrizzjoni morda u lanqas fuq infuskom meta inti tiekol minn tiegħek djar [stess] jew l-djar ta 'missirijiet tiegħek jew l-djar ta' ommijiet tiegħek jew l-djar ta 'aħwa tiegħek

trans-unit.source: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and, when they are [meeting] with him for a matter of common interest, do not depart until they have asked his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission, [O Muhammad] - those are the ones who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for something of their affairs, then give permission to whom you will among them and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: -Fidili huma biss dawk li jemmnu fil Allah u Messenger Tiegħu u, meta jkunu [laqgħa] miegħu għal materja ta 'interess komuni, ma telqux qabel ma jkunu talbu permess tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [your] calling of the Messenger among yourselves as the call of one of you to another. Already Allah knows those of you who slip away, concealed by others. So let those beware who dissent from the Prophet's order, lest fitnah strike them or a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: M'għandekx tagħmel [tiegħek] ssejjaħ tal-Messenger fost infuskom bħas-sejħa ta 'waħda minnkom għall-ieħor.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Already He knows that upon which you [stand] and [knows] the Day when they will be returned to Him and He will inform them of what they have done. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Bla dubju, li Allah jappartjeni kollu li hu fil-smewwiet u l-earth.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who sent down the Criterion upon His Servant that he may be to the worlds a warner -
trans-unit.target: Beatu huwa hu li bagħtet l-kriterju li fuqu Qaddej tiegħu li hu jista 'jkun li l-dinjiet ta' Warner -

trans-unit.source: He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and who has not taken a son and has not had a partner in dominion and has created each thing and determined it with [precise] determination.
trans-unit.target: Huwa li lilha tappartjeni l-dominion tal-franki u l-earth u li ma jkunx ħa tifel u ma kellhiex sieħeb fil dominion u ħoloq kull ħaġa u determinati li b'determinazzjoni [preċiżi].

trans-unit.source: But they have taken besides Him gods which create nothing, while they are created, and possess not for themselves any harm or benefit and possess not [power to cause] death or life or resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Iżda huma jkunu ħadu minbarra allat lilu li joħolqu xejn, waqt li jkunu qed jinħolqu, u jippossjedu mhux għalihom infushom xi ħsara jew benefiċċju u jippossjedu mhux [poter li jikkawżaw] mewt jew ħajja jew qawmien.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "This [Qur'an] is not except a falsehood he invented, and another people assisted him in it." But they have committed an injustice and a lie.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li disbelieve jgħidu, "Dan [Qur'an] mhuwiex ħlief falsità huwa inventat, u n-nies oħra assistiti lilu fiha."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon."
trans-unit.target: U jgħidu, "Leġġendi tal-popli ta 'qabel li hu jkun miktub stabbiliti, u huma ddettati lilu filgħodu u wara nofsinhar."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Say, [O Muhammad], "Ġie żvelat mill Hu li jaf [kull] sigrieta fis-smewwiet u l-earth. Tabilħaqq, Huwa qatt klementi u ħniena."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner?
trans-unit.target: U jgħidu, "X'inhu dan messaġġier li jiekol l-ikel u mixjiet fis-swieq? Għaliex kienx hemm jkunx mibgħut isfel lilu anġlu hekk hu se jkunu miegħu Warner?

trans-unit.source: Or [why is not] a treasure presented to him [from heaven], or does he [not] have a garden from which he eats?" And the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Jew [għaliex mhuwiex] teżor ppreżentat lilu [mis-sema], jew ma hu [ma] għandekx ġnien minn fejn hu jiekol? "U l-kontraventuri jgħidu," Inti ssegwi le iżda raġel affettwati mill magic. "

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Ħares kif dawn strajk għalik paraguni;

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who, if He willed, could have made for you [something] better than that - gardens beneath which rivers flow - and could make for you palaces.
trans-unit.target: Beatu huwa hu li, jekk Hu willed, setgħu għamlu għalik [xi ħaġa] aħjar minn dak - ġonna taħt liema xmajjar fluss - u jista 'jagħmel għalik palazzi.

trans-unit.source: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Iżda huma ċaħdu l-Siegħa, u Aħna ippreparati għal dawk li jiċħdu l-Siegħa ta 'Blaze.

trans-unit.source: When the Hellfire sees them from a distant place, they will hear its fury and roaring.
trans-unit.target: Meta l-Hellfire jara għalihom minn post imbiegħed, dawn se jisimgħu fury tiegħu u enormi.

trans-unit.source: And when they are thrown into a narrow place therein bound in chains, they will cry out thereupon for destruction.
trans-unit.target: U meta jitwaddbu fil-post dejqa fih marbuta fil-ktajjen, dawn se jgħajtu wara dan għall-qerda.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."
trans-unit.target: [Huma ser ikunu avżati], "Ma cry dan il-Jum għall-qerda wieħed iżda cry għall-qerda ħafna."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.
trans-unit.target: Say, "Hu li aħjar jew l-Garden ta 'Eternity li hija wiegħed li l-twajbin? Se jkun għalihom premju u d-destinazzjoni.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is whatever they wish, [while] abiding eternally. It is ever upon your Lord a promise [worthy to be] requested.
trans-unit.target: Għalihom fih huwa dak kollu li jixtiequ, [filwaqt li] jobdu eternally.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day He will gather them and that which they worship besides Allah and will say, "Did you mislead these, My servants, or did they [themselves] stray from the way?"
trans-unit.target: U [tismija] l He Jum se jiġbru lilhom u dak li huma qima minbarra Allah u se ngħid, "Ridt tiżgwida lill dawn, impjegati tiegħi, jew ma huma [ruħhom] stray mill-mod?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Exalted are You! It was not for us to take besides You any allies. But You provided comforts for them and their fathers until they forgot the message and became a people ruined."
trans-unit.target: Huma se ngħid, "Exalted inti! Ma kienx għalina biex tieħu minbarra Inti xi alleati. Iżda Inti pprovduta comforts għalihom u missirijiet tagħhom sakemm nesa l-messaġġ u sar nies ruined."

trans-unit.source: So they will deny you, [disbelievers], in what you say, and you cannot avert [punishment] or [find] help. And whoever commits injustice among you - We will make him taste a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Allura dawn se tiċħad lilek, [disbelievers], fil dak li jgħidu, u inti ma tistax tevita [piena] jew [issib] għajnuna.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you, [O Muhammad], any of the messengers except that they ate food and walked in the markets. And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience? And ever is your Lord, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ma bagħatx qabel int, [O Muhammad], kwalunkwe mill-messaġġiera ħlief li huma kielu ikel u mixi fis-swieq.

trans-unit.source: And those who do not expect the meeting with Us say, "Why were not angels sent down to us, or [why] do we [not] see our Lord?" They have certainly become arrogant within themselves and [become] insolent with great insolence.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li ma jistennewx il-laqgħa ma Us jgħidu, "Għaliex ma kinux anġli mibgħuta isfel lilna, jew [għaliex] do we [ma] jara Sidna?"

trans-unit.source: The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible."
trans-unit.target: Il-jum jaraw l-anġli - l-ebda tidings tajba se jkun hemm dik il-ġurnata għall-kriminali, u [l-anġli] se ngħid, "Xkiel u inaċċessibbli."

trans-unit.source: And We will regard what they have done of deeds and make them as dust dispersed.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna se kkunsidra dak li għamlu ta 'atti u jagħmluhom bħala trab mxerrda.

trans-unit.source: The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.
trans-unit.target: Il kumpanji ta 'Paradise, li Jum, huma [fi] ftehim aħjar u aħjar post ta' mistrieħ.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.
trans-unit.target: U [tismija] il-Jum meta l-sema se maqsuma miftuħ ma 'sħab [emerġenti], u l-anġli se jintbagħtu fl dixxendenza suċċessivi.

trans-unit.source: True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful. And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.
trans-unit.target: sovranità Veru, li Jum, hija l-biċċa l-kbira ħniena.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret] he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.
trans-unit.target: U l-Jum l-ħati se gidma fuq l-idejn tiegħu [fis dispjaċir] hu se ngħid, "Oh, nixtieq I kien ħa mal-Messenger mod.

trans-unit.source: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.
trans-unit.target: Oh, woe lili!

trans-unit.source: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me. And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."
trans-unit.target: Huwa wasslitni bogħod mill-tifkira wara li kienet ħarġet lili.

trans-unit.source: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."
trans-unit.target: U l Messenger qal, "O Mulej tiegħi, tabilħaqq poplu tiegħi ħadu din il-Qur'an bħala [ħaġa] abbandunati."

trans-unit.source: And thus have We made for every prophet an enemy from among the criminals. But sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a helper.
trans-unit.target: U għalhekk għandhom Għamilna għal kull profeta ghadu minn fost il-kriminali.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "Why was the Qur'an not revealed to him all at once?" Thus [it is] that We may strengthen thereby your heart. And We have spaced it distinctly.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li disbelieve jgħidu, "Għaliex il-Qur'an ma żvela lilu kollha f'daqqa?"

trans-unit.source: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.
trans-unit.target: U ma jiġu għandek ma 'l-argument ħlief li Aħna idaħħlu inti l-verità u l-ispjegazzjoni aħjar.

trans-unit.source: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: Dawk li huma miġbura fuq wiċċ tagħhom lejn l-infern - dawk huma l-agħar fil-pożizzjoni u aktar 'il bogħod astray fil-mod [tagħhom].

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.
trans-unit.target: U Kellna ċertament minħabba Mosè l-Iskrittura u ħatar miegħu ħuh Aron tiegħu bħala assistent.

trans-unit.source: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna qal, "Mur tnejn inti lill-persuni li jkunu miċħuda sinjali tagħna."

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: U l-poplu ta 'Noah - meta mċaħħda l-messaġġiera, Aħna għerqu minnhom, u Għamilna lilhom għall-umanità sinjal.

trans-unit.source: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.
trans-unit.target: U [Aħna meqruda] "AAD u Thamud u l kumpanji tal-bir u bosta ġenerazzjonijiet bejniethom.

trans-unit.source: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: U għal kull Aħna ppreżenta eżempji [bħala twissijiet], u kull Aħna meqruda u ma tħalla qerda [totali].

trans-unit.source: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.
trans-unit.target: U huma jkunu diġà jidħlu fuq il-belt li kienet showered ma 'xita ta' ħażen.

trans-unit.source: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?
trans-unit.target: U meta tara int, [O Muhammad], huma jieħdu inti ma ħlief fil redikolu, [qal], "Huwa dan il-wieħed minnhom Allah tkun bagħtet bħala messaġġier?

trans-unit.source: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.
trans-unit.target: Huwa kważi kien żgwida lilna mill allat tagħna kellhom aħna ma kienx sod f '[qima ta'] minnhom. "Imma huma ser ikunu jafu, meta jaraw l-piena, li tkun aktar 'il bogħod astray fil-mod [tiegħu].

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?
trans-unit.target: Have you raw il-wieħed li jieħu bħala alla tiegħu x-xewqa tiegħu stess?

trans-unit.source: Or do you think that most of them hear or reason? They are not except like livestock. Rather, they are [even] more astray in [their] way.
trans-unit.target: Jew taħseb li ħafna minnhom ma jisimgħux jew raġuni?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered your Lord - how He extends the shadow, and if He willed, He could have made it stationary? Then We made the sun for it an indication.
trans-unit.target: Have you mhux meqjus tiegħek Mulej - kif Hu jestendi l-dell, u jekk He willed, Hu biss seta 'stazzjonarju?

trans-unit.source: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Inżommu fl-idejn għal ħakma qasira.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night for you as clothing and sleep [a means for] rest and has made the day a resurrection.
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li għamel il-lejl għalik bħala ilbies u ta 'rqad [mezz biex] mistrieħ u għamlet il-jum ta' qawmien.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who sends the winds as good tidings before His mercy, and We send down from the sky pure water
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li tibgħat l-irjieħ huma tidings tajba qabel ħniena tiegħu, u Aħna jibgħat l isfel mill-ilma pur sema

trans-unit.source: That We may bring to life thereby a dead land and give it as drink to those We created of numerous livestock and men.
trans-unit.target: Dik Aħna jista 'jġib għall-ħajja u b'hekk l-art mejta u jagħtu bħala xarba ma' dawk Ħloqna tal-bhejjem numerużi u l-irġiel.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly distributed it among them that they might be reminded, but most of the people refuse except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ċertament mqassma bejniethom li dawn jistgħu jiġu mfakkra, imma ħafna mill-poplu jirrifjutaw ħlief disbelief.

trans-unit.source: And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.
trans-unit.target: U jekk Kellna willed, Stajna bagħtu fis-kull belt Warner.

trans-unit.source: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.
trans-unit.target: Allura ma jobdu l-disbelievers, u jistinkaw kontrihom bil-Qur'an ta 'tistinka kbira.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has released [simultaneously] the two seas, one fresh and sweet and one salty and bitter, and He placed between them a barrier and prohibiting partition.
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li tkun rilaxxata [simultanjament]-żewġ ibħra, wieħed frisk u ħelu u wieħed mielħa u morr, u Hu mqiegħda bejniethom barriera u tipprojbixxi partition.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li ħoloq minn ilma bniedem u magħmula lilu [qarib minn] nisel u ż-żwieġ.

trans-unit.source: But they worship rather than Allah that which does not benefit them or harm them, and the disbeliever is ever, against his Lord, an assistant [to Satan].
trans-unit.target: Iżda huma qima pjuttost milli Allah dak li ma tibbenefikax minnhom jew tagħmlilhom il-ħsara, u l-disbeliever hija qatt, kontra Mulej tiegħu, assistent [li Satana].

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ma bagħtitlek, [O Muhammad], ħlief bħala bringer ta tidings tajba u Warner.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not ask of you for it any payment - only that whoever wills might take to his Lord a way."
trans-unit.target: Say, "I ma jistaqsu inti għaliha kwalunkwe ħlas -. Biss li kull min testmenti tista 'tieħu biex Mulej tiegħu b'mod"

trans-unit.source: And rely upon the Ever-Living who does not die, and exalt [Allah] with His praise. And sufficient is He to be, with the sins of His servants, Acquainted -
trans-unit.target: U jiddependu fuq il-Ħajja Ever li ma jmutu, u teżalta [Allah] bl tifħir tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: He who created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days and then established Himself above the Throne - the Most Merciful, so ask about Him one well informed.
trans-unit.target: Hu li ħoloq il-smewwiet u l-earth u dak li hu bejniethom f'sitt ijiem u mbagħad stabbiliti nnifsu fuq mill-tron - il-biċċa l-kbira ħniena, hekk staqsi dwar lilu wieħed infurmati tajjeb.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate to the Most Merciful," they say, "And what is the Most Merciful? Should we prostrate to that which you order us?" And it increases them in aversion.
trans-unit.target: U meta huwa qal lilhom, "prostrate għall-biċċa l-kbira ħniena," jgħidu, "U dak huwa l-biċċa l-kbira ħniena? Jekk aħna prostrate għal dak li inti ordni minna?"

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.
trans-unit.target: Beatu huwa hu li poġġa fis-istilel sema kbir u mqiegħda fih l-[ħruq] lampa u qamar luminuża.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession for whoever desires to remember or desires gratitude.
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li għamel il-lejl u l-jum wara xulxin għal kull min jixtieq li tiftakar jew jixtieq gratitudni.

trans-unit.source: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace,
trans-unit.target: U l-impjegati ta 'l-iktar ħniena huma dawk li jimxu fuq l-art faċilment, u meta l-indirizz injorant minnhom [ħarex], jgħidu [kliem ta]-paċi,

trans-unit.source: And those who spend [part of] the night to their Lord prostrating and standing [in prayer]
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jqattgħu [parti] ta 'l-lejl li Mulej prostrating tagħhom u bil-wieqfa [fit-talb]

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jgħidu, "Mulej tagħna, jevitaw minna l-piena tal-infern Tabilħaqq, piena tagħha qiegħda dejjem jeħel.;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is evil as a settlement and residence."
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, huwa ħażen bħala soluzzjoni u r-residenza. "

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who, when they spend, do so not excessively or sparingly but are ever, between that, [justly] moderate
trans-unit.target: U [huma] dawk li, meta dawn jonfqu, jagħmlu hekk mhux eċċessivament jew kemxejn, iżda huma dejjem, bejn dak, [b'mod ġust] moderat

trans-unit.source: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li ma tinvoka bl Allah diety ieħor jew joqtol l-ruħ li Allah jkun ipprojbixxa [li jiġu maqtula], ħlief id-dritt, u ma jikkommettu kopulazzjoni sesswali illegali.

trans-unit.source: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -
trans-unit.target: Immultiplikat għalih huwa l-kastig fuq il-Jum ta 'Resurrection, u hu ser jirrispettaw fih umiljati -

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ħlief għal dawk li jindem, jemmnu u jagħmlu x-xogħol twajbin.

trans-unit.source: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance.
trans-unit.target: U hu min repents u ma tjieba tabilħaqq iduru lejn Alla ma indiema [aċċettata].

trans-unit.source: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.
trans-unit.target: U [huma] dawk li ma jixhdu li falsità, u meta dawn jgħaddu ħdejn diskors morda, dawn jgħaddu minn b'dinjità.

trans-unit.source: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li, meta mfakkra l-versi tal-Mulej tagħhom, ma jaqgħux fuqhom torox u għomja.

trans-unit.source: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous."
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jgħidu, "Mulej tagħna, jagħti lilna minn fost nisa tagħna u l-kumdità frieħ lill-għajnejn tagħna u jagħmel lilna eżempju għall-ġust."

trans-unit.source: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.
trans-unit.target: Dawn se jingħataw il-Kamra għal dak li paċenzja imġarrab, u dawn se jkunu riċevuti fihom bil tislijiet u [kliem ta] paċi.

trans-unit.source: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.
trans-unit.target: Jobdu eternally fih.

trans-unit.source: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent.
trans-unit.target: Say, "Xi jkun kura Mulej tiegħi għalik jekk mhux għall supplication tiegħek?"

trans-unit.source: Ta, Seen, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ta, Seen, Meem.

trans-unit.source: These are the verses of the clear Book.
trans-unit.target: Dawn huma l-versi tal-Ktieb ċar.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
trans-unit.target: Forsi, [O Muhammad], inti joqtlu lilek innifsek bil grief li dawn mhux se jkunu fidili.

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.
trans-unit.target: Jekk Aħna willed, Aħna tista 'tibgħat l isfel lilhom mis-sema sinjal li għalih għenuq tagħhom tibqa' humbled.

trans-unit.source: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it.
trans-unit.target: U l-ebda rivelazzjoni jasal għalihom mill-ġdid mill-biċċa l-kbira ħniena ħlief li dawn jibdlu l bogħod minnha.

trans-unit.source: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Għal dawn diġà miċħuda, iżda se jidħlu għalihom hemmhekk l-aħbarijiet ta 'dak li huma użati biex redikolu.

trans-unit.source: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind?
trans-unit.target: Ma huma ma nħarsu lejn l-art - kemm Għandna prodotti hemmhekk minn kull tip nobbli?

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq f'dak huwa sinjal, iżda ħafna minnhom ma kienux ikunu fidili.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: U fil-fatt, Mulej tiegħek - Huwa l-Exalted fl Jista, il ħniena.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people -
trans-unit.target: U [tismija] meta Mulej tiegħek imsejħa Mosè, [qal], "Mur fil-poplu illeċti -

trans-unit.source: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
