trans-unit.source: And they say, "If we were to follow the guidance with you, we would be swept from our land." Have we not established for them a safe sanctuary to which are brought the fruits of all things as provision from Us? But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: U jgħidu, "Jekk konna biex isegwu l-gwida miegħek, aħna se jkunu swept mill-art tagħna."

trans-unit.source: And how many a city have We destroyed that was insolent in its [way of] living, and those are their dwellings which have not been inhabited after them except briefly. And it is We who were the inheritors.
trans-unit.target: U kemm ta 'belt għandhom Aħna meqruda li kien insolent f' [mod ta '] tiegħu għajxien, u dawk li huma residenzi tagħhom li ma ġewx abitati wara minnhom ħlief fil-qosor.

trans-unit.source: And never would your Lord have destroyed the cities until He had sent to their mother a messenger reciting to them Our verses. And We would not destroy the cities except while their people were wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: U qatt ma Mulej tiegħek kienu meqruda l-ibliet sat Hu kien bagħat lil ommhom messaġġier reciting għalihom versi tagħna.

trans-unit.source: And whatever thing you [people] have been given - it is [only for] the enjoyment of worldly life and its adornment. And what is with Allah is better and more lasting; so will you not use reason?
trans-unit.target: U tkun xi ħaġa li [n-nies] ġew mogħtija - huwa [biss għall]-tgawdija tal-ħajja worldly u tiżjin tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: Then is he whom We have promised a good promise which he will obtain like he for whom We provided enjoyment of worldly life [but] then he is, on the Day of Resurrection, among those presented [for punishment in Hell]?
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad huwa hu min Għandna wegħdu wegħda tajba li hu se tikseb simili hu li għalihom We pprovduti tgawdija tal-ħajja worldly [iżda] allura huwa, fuq il-Jum ta 'Resurrection, fost dawk ippreżentati [għall-piena fl-infern]?

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are My 'partners' which you used to claim?"
trans-unit.target: U [jwissu dwar]-Jum Huwa se jsejħulhom u jgħidu, "Fejn huma" imsieħba "My li inti użati biex jitolbu?"

trans-unit.source: Those upon whom the word will have come into effect will say, "Our Lord, these are the ones we led to error. We led them to error just as we were in error. We declare our disassociation [from them] to You. They did not used to worship us."
trans-unit.target: Dawk li fuqhom il-kelma se jkunu ġejjin fis-seħħ se ngħid, "Mulej tagħna, dawn huma dawk li aħna wasslu għal żball. Aħna wassal għal żball eżatt kif aħna kien fihom xi żball. Aħna niddikjaraw distakk tagħna [minnhom] lill You. Huma

trans-unit.source: And it will be said, "Invoke your 'partners' " and they will invoke them; but they will not respond to them, and they will see the punishment. If only they had followed guidance!
trans-unit.target: U se jkun qal, "Jinvokaw tiegħek" imsieħba "" u dawn se tinvoka minnhom;

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day He will call them and say, "What did you answer the messengers?"
trans-unit.target: U [tismija] l He Jum se jsejħulhom u jgħidu, "What did you twieġeb il-messaġġiera?"

trans-unit.source: But the information will be unapparent to them that Day, so they will not [be able to] ask one another.
trans-unit.target: Iżda l-informazzjoni se tkun unapparent lilhom li Jum, hekk dawn mhux se [ikunu jistgħu] jistaqsu lil xulxin.

trans-unit.source: But as for one who had repented, believed, and done righteousness, it is promised by Allah that he will be among the successful.
trans-unit.target: Iżda bħal wieħed li kien nidem, maħsub, u tjieba jsir, huwa imwiegħed mill Allah li hu se jkunu fost l-suċċess.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord creates what He wills and chooses; not for them was the choice. Exalted is Allah and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: U Lord tiegħek toħloq dak li Hu testmenti u jagħżel;

trans-unit.source: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.
trans-unit.target: U Lord tiegħek jaf dak isdra tagħhom jaħbu u dak li jiddikjaraw.

trans-unit.source: And He is Allah; there is no deity except Him. To Him is [due all] praise in the first [life] and the Hereafter. And His is the [final] decision, and to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: U Huwa Alla;

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the night continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you light? Then will you not hear?"
trans-unit.target: Say, "Have you kkunsidrati:? Jekk Alla għandha tagħmel għalik il-lejl kontinwu sal-Jum ta 'Resurrection, liema diety minbarra Allah jista' jġib inti ħfief Imbagħad ser ikollok ma tisma?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if Allah should make for you the day continuous until the Day of Resurrection, what deity other than Allah could bring you a night in which you may rest? Then will you not see?"
trans-unit.target: Say, "Have you kkunsidrati:? Jekk Alla għandha tagħmel għalik l-ġurnata kontinwu sal-Jum ta 'Resurrection, liema diety minbarra Allah tista' ġġib inti lejl fejn inti tista 'mistrieħ Imbagħad ser ikollok ma tara?"

trans-unit.source: And out of His mercy He made for you the night and the day that you may rest therein and [by day] seek from His bounty and [that] perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: U 'l barra tal-ħniena tiegħu Għamel għalik il-lejl u l-jum li inti tista' mistrieħ fiha u [b'jum] jitolbu mill Bounty tiegħu u [li] forsi inti ser tkun grat.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are my 'partners' which you used to claim?"
trans-unit.target: U [jwissu dwar]-Jum Huwa se jsejħulhom u jgħidu, "Fejn huma" imsieħba "tiegħi li inti użati biex jitolbu?"

trans-unit.source: And We will extract from every nation a witness and say, "Produce your proof," and they will know that the truth belongs to Allah, and lost from them is that which they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna se estratt minn kull nazzjon xhud u jgħidu, "Produce prova tiegħek," u li se jkun jaf li l-verità tappartjeni għall Allah, u mitlufa minnhom huwa dak li huma użati biex jivvintaw.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Qarun was from the people of Moses, but he tyrannized them. And We gave him of treasures whose keys would burden a band of strong men; thereupon his people said to him, "Do not exult. Indeed, Allah does not like the exultant.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, Qarun kien mill-poplu ta 'Mosè, imma hu tyrannized minnhom.

trans-unit.source: But seek, through that which Allah has given you, the home of the Hereafter; and [yet], do not forget your share of the world. And do good as Allah has done good to you. And desire not corruption in the land. Indeed, Allah does not like corrupters."
trans-unit.target: Iżda tfittex, permezz ta 'dak li Allah tak, l-dar tal-Minn hawn;

trans-unit.source: He said, "I was only given it because of knowledge I have." Did he not know that Allah had destroyed before him of generations those who were greater than him in power and greater in accumulation [of wealth]? But the criminals, about their sins, will not be asked.
trans-unit.target: Huwa qal, "I kien biss mogħti lilha minħabba l-għarfien jien."

trans-unit.source: So he came out before his people in his adornment. Those who desired the worldly life said, "Oh, would that we had like what was given to Qarun. Indeed, he is one of great fortune."
trans-unit.target: Hekk hu ħareġ qabel poplu tiegħu fl tiżjin tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: But those who had been given knowledge said, "Woe to you! The reward of Allah is better for he who believes and does righteousness. And none are granted it except the patient."
trans-unit.target: Iżda dawk li kienu ġew mogħtija għarfien qal, "Woe lilek! Il-premju ta 'Allah huwa aħjar hu li jemmen u ma tjieba. U l-ebda wieħed qed jingħataw lilha minbarra l-pazjent."

trans-unit.source: And We caused the earth to swallow him and his home. And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor was he of those who [could] defend themselves.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ikkawżat l-art biex tibla lilu u dar tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: And those who had wished for his position the previous day began to say, "Oh, how Allah extends provision to whom He wills of His servants and restricts it! If not that Allah had conferred favor on us, He would have caused it to swallow us. Oh, how the disbelievers do not succeed!"
trans-unit.target: U dawk li kienu xtaqu għall-pożizzjoni tiegħu tal-ġurnata ta 'qabel bdew jgħidu, "Oh, kif Allah testendi dispożizzjoni għalihom Huwa testmenti applikabbli għall-aġenti tiegħu u tillimita dan! Jekk le li Allah kienet mogħtija favur fuqna, Hu kien jikkawża li tibla

trans-unit.source: That home of the Hereafter We assign to those who do not desire exaltedness upon the earth or corruption. And the [best] outcome is for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Li d-dar tal-Minn hawn Għandna jassenja lil dawk li ma xewqa exaltedness fuq l-art jew korruzzjoni.

trans-unit.source: Whoever comes [on the Day of Judgement] with a good deed will have better than it; and whoever comes with an evil deed - then those who did evil deeds will not be recompensed except [as much as] what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Min jiġi [dwar il-Jum ta 'Sentenza] bi att tajba se jkollhom aħjar minn dan;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, [O Muhammad], He who imposed upon you the Qur'an will take you back to a place of return. Say, "My Lord is most knowing of who brings guidance and who is in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, [O Muhammad], Hu li imponiet fuqkom l-Qur'an se tieħu inti lura għal post ta 'ritorn.

trans-unit.source: And you were not expecting that the Book would be conveyed to you, but [it is] a mercy from your Lord. So do not be an assistant to the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: U inti ma kinux jistennew li l-Ktieb se tkun imwassla lilek, imma [huwa] a ħniena minn Lord tiegħek.

trans-unit.source: And never let them avert you from the verses of Allah after they have been revealed to you. And invite [people] to your Lord. And never be of those who associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: U qatt ħallihom jevitaw inti mill-versi ta 'Allah wara li jkunu ġew żvelati lilek.

trans-unit.source: And do not invoke with Allah another deity. There is no deity except Him. Everything will be destroyed except His Face. His is the judgement, and to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: U ma tinvoka bl Allah diety ieħor.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Meem

trans-unit.source: Do the people think that they will be left to say, "We believe" and they will not be tried?
trans-unit.target: Jagħmlu l-poplu jaħsbu li se titħalla jgħidu, "Aħna nemmnu" u dawn mhux se jinstemgħu?

trans-unit.source: But We have certainly tried those before them, and Allah will surely make evident those who are truthful, and He will surely make evident the liars.
trans-unit.target: Iżda Aħna ċertament ppruvaw dawk quddiemhom, u Alla żgur li se jagħmel evidenti dawk li huma veri, u Hu żgur li se jagħmel evidenti l liars.

trans-unit.source: Or do those who do evil deeds think they can outrun Us? Evil is what they judge.
trans-unit.target: Jew do dawk li jagħmlu atti ħażen jaħsbu li jistgħu outrun Us?

trans-unit.source: Whoever should hope for the meeting with Allah - indeed, the term decreed by Allah is coming. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Kull min għandu tama għall-laqgħa mal Allah - tabilħaqq, it-terminu iddekretati mill Allah huwa li ġejjin.

trans-unit.source: And whoever strives only strives for [the benefit of] himself. Indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: U min tirsisti biss tħabrek għall [-benefiċċju ta '] innifsu.

trans-unit.source: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely remove from them their misdeeds and will surely reward them according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jemmnu u jagħmlu atti twajbin - Aħna żgur li se tneħħi minnhom misdeeds tagħhom u żgur li se jippremjahom skond l-aqwa ta 'dak li huma użati biex jagħmlu.

trans-unit.source: And We have enjoined upon man goodness to parents. But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. To Me is your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ordnat lill goodness bniedem għall-ġenituri.

trans-unit.source: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely admit them among the righteous [into Paradise].
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jemmnu u jagħmlu atti twajbin - Aħna żgur li se jammettu lilhom fost l-righteous [in Paradise].

trans-unit.source: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah," but when one [of them] is harmed for [the cause of] Allah, they consider the trial of the people as [if it were] the punishment of Allah. But if victory comes from your Lord, they say, "Indeed, We were with you." Is not Allah most knowing of what is within the breasts of all creatures?
trans-unit.target: U l-poplu xi wħud li jgħidu, "Aħna nemmnu fil Allah," iżda meta wieħed [minnhom], isofri ħsara għall [-kawża ta '] Allah, huma jqisu l-prova tal-poplu kif [li kieku kienet] il-piena ta' Allah

trans-unit.source: And Allah will surely make evident those who believe, and He will surely make evident the hypocrites.
trans-unit.target: U Alla żgur li se jagħmel evidenti dawk li jemmnu, u Hu żgur li se jagħmel evidenti l hypocrites.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Follow our way, and we will carry your sins." But they will not carry anything of their sins. Indeed, they are liars.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li disbelieve jgħidu lil dawk li jemmnu, "Follow mod tagħna, u aħna se twettaq dnubiet tiegħek."

trans-unit.source: But they will surely carry their [own] burdens and [other] burdens along with their burdens, and they will surely be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: Imma dawn żgur li se jwettqu tagħhom piżijiet [stess] u [l-oħra] piżijiet flimkien ma 'piżijiet tagħhom, u dawn żgur li se jiġi mistoqsi dwar il-Jum ta' Resurrection dwar dak li huma użati biex jivvintaw.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent Noah to his people, and he remained among them a thousand years minus fifty years, and the flood seized them while they were wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ċertament mibgħuta Noah lill-poplu tiegħu, u hu baqa bejniethom elf sena nieqes ħamsin sena, u l-għargħar maqbuda lilhom waqt li kienu kontraventuri.

trans-unit.source: But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it a sign for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Iżda Aħna salvati lilu u l-kumpanji tal-vapur, u Aħna għamilha sinjal għall-dinjiet.

trans-unit.source: And [We sent] Abraham, when he said to his people, "Worship Allah and fear Him. That is best for you, if you should know.
trans-unit.target: U [Aħna mibgħuta] Abraham, meta qal li l-poplu tiegħu, "Qima Allah u biża lilu. Dan huwa l-aħjar għalik, jekk inti għandek tkun taf.

trans-unit.source: You only worship, besides Allah, idols, and you produce a falsehood. Indeed, those you worship besides Allah do not possess for you [the power of] provision. So seek from Allah provision and worship Him and be grateful to Him. To Him you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: Inti biss qima, minbarra Allah, idols, u inti tipproduċi falsità.

trans-unit.source: And if you [people] deny [the message] - already nations before you have denied. And there is not upon the Messenger except [the duty of] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: U jekk inti [nies] jiċħdu [-messaġġ] - diġà nazzjonijiet qabel ikollok miċħuda.

trans-unit.source: Have they not considered how Allah begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
trans-unit.target: Have huma ma kkunsidrat kif Allah jibda ħolqien u mbagħad jirrepeti dan?

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how He began creation. Then Allah will produce the final creation. Indeed Allah, over all things, is competent."
trans-unit.target: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel permezz tal-art u josservaw kif Beda ħolqien. Imbagħad Alla se jipproduċi l-ħolqien finali. Tabilħaqq Allah, fuq affarijiet kollha, huwa kompetenti."

trans-unit.source: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Huwa jikkastiga għalihom Huwa testmenti u għandu ħniena li fuqhom hu testmenti, u lilu inti ser jiġu rritornati.

trans-unit.source: And you will not cause failure [to Allah] upon the earth or in the heaven. And you have not other than Allah any protector or any helper.
trans-unit.target: U int mhux se jikkawża nuqqas [li Allah] fuq l-art jew fil-sema.

trans-unit.source: And the ones who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and the meeting with Him - those have despaired of My mercy, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li disbelieve fil-sinjali ta 'Allah u l-laqgħa miegħu - dawn ikunu despaired tal-ħniena tiegħi, u dawn se jkollhom piena uġigħ.

trans-unit.source: And the answer of Abraham's people was not but that they said, "Kill him or burn him," but Allah saved him from the fire. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: U t-tweġiba ta 'nies Abraham ma kienx iżda li dawn qal, "Kill lilu jew taħraq lilu," iżda Allah f'corner mill-nar.

trans-unit.source: And [Abraham] said, "You have only taken, other than Allah, idols as [a bond of] affection among you in worldly life. Then on the Day of Resurrection you will deny one another and curse one another, and your refuge will be the Fire, and you will not have any helpers."
trans-unit.target: U [Abraham] qal, "Inti għandek biss jittieħdu, minbarra Allah, idols bħala [bond ta] affezzjoni fostkom fil-ħajja worldly. Imbagħad fuq il-Jum ta 'Resurrection inti ser tiċħad lil xulxin u curse xulxin, u kenn tiegħek ser

trans-unit.source: And Lot believed him. [Abraham] said, "Indeed, I will emigrate to [the service of] my Lord. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
trans-unit.target: U Lot maħsub għalih.

trans-unit.source: And We gave to Him Isaac and Jacob and placed in his descendants prophethood and scripture. And We gave him his reward in this world, and indeed, he is in the Hereafter among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna taw lilu Isaac u Jacob u mqiegħda fis-dixxendenti prophethood tiegħu u Iskrittura.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Indeed, you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds.
trans-unit.target: U [isemmu] Lot, meta qal li l-poplu tiegħu, "Tabilħaqq, inti jikkommettu bħal immoralità bħala ebda wieħed preċedut inti ma minn fost il-dinjiet.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you approach men and obstruct the road and commit in your meetings [every] evil." And the answer of his people was not but they said, "Bring us the punishment of Allah, if you should be of the truthful."
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, inti approċċ irġiel u jostakolaw it-triq u jimpenjaw f'laqgħat tiegħek [kull] ħażen. "U t-tweġiba tal-poplu tiegħu ma kienx, iżda dawn qalu," Ġib magħna l-piena ta 'Allah, jekk inti għandek tkun tal-veritiera. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, support me against the corrupting people."
trans-unit.target: Huwa qal, "Mulej tiegħi, appoġġ me kontra l-poplu corrupting."

trans-unit.source: And when Our messengers came to Abraham with the good tidings, they said, "Indeed, we will destroy the people of that Lot's city. Indeed, its people have been wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: U meta messaġġiera tagħna waslet għall Abraham mal-tidings tajba, huma qalu, "Tassew, aħna se jeqred il-poplu tal-belt li lott ta. Tabilħaqq, in-nies tiegħu kienu kontraventuri."

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Indeed, within it is Lot." They said, "We are more knowing of who is within it. We will surely save him and his family, except his wife. She is to be of those who remain behind."
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] qal, "Fil-fatt, fi ħdanu huwa Lott."

trans-unit.source: And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was distressed for them and felt for them great discomfort. They said, "Fear not, nor grieve. Indeed, we will save you and your family, except your wife; she is to be of those who remain behind.
trans-unit.target: U meta messaġġiera tagħna waslet għall Lot, kien f'diffikultà għalihom u ħass għalihom skumdità kbira.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we will bring down on the people of this city punishment from the sky because they have been defiantly disobedient."
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, aħna se jġib isfel fuq il-poplu ta 'din il-piena belt mill-sema minħabba li jkunu ġew defiantly disobedient. "

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly left of it a sign as clear evidence for a people who use reason.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna żgur ħallew minnu 'sinjal bħala evidenza ċara għal persuni li jużaw ir-raġuni.

trans-unit.source: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah and expect the Last Day and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption."
trans-unit.target: U biex Madyan [Aħna mibgħuta] ħuh Shu'ayb tagħhom, u hu qal, "O poplu tiegħi, qima Allah u jistennew l-Jum l-aħħar u ma jikkommettu abbuż fuq l-earth, tixrid korruzzjoni."

trans-unit.source: But they denied him, so the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.
trans-unit.target: Iżda huma ċaħdulu, hekk it-terremot maqbuda lilhom, u dawn saru fil-dar tagħhom [kadavri] fallen suxxettibbli.

trans-unit.source: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud, and it has become clear to you from their [ruined] dwellings. And Satan had made pleasing to them their deeds and averted them from the path, and they were endowed with perception.
trans-unit.target: U [Aħna meqruda] "AAD u Thamud, u sar ċar lilek minn residenzi [ruined] tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: And [We destroyed] Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses had already come to them with clear evidences, and they were arrogant in the land, but they were not outrunners [of Our punishment].
trans-unit.target: U [Aħna meqruda] Qarun u Fargħun u Haman.

trans-unit.source: So each We seized for his sin; and among them were those upon whom We sent a storm of stones, and among them were those who were seized by the blast [from the sky], and among them were those whom We caused the earth to swallow, and among them were those whom We drowned. And Allah would not have wronged them, but it was they who were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Allura kull Aħna maqbuda għad-dnub tiegħu;

trans-unit.source: The example of those who take allies other than Allah is like that of the spider who takes a home. And indeed, the weakest of homes is the home of the spider, if they only knew.
trans-unit.target: L-eżempju ta 'dawk li jieħdu alleati oħra minbarra Allah hija bħal dik tal-brimba li tieħu dar.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, Alla jaf ikun x'ikun ħaġa li jitolbu lill għajr lilu.

trans-unit.source: And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge.
trans-unit.target: U dawn l-eżempji Aħna preżenti għall-poplu, iżda ħadd se jifhmu lilhom ħlief dawk ta 'l-għarfien.

trans-unit.source: Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth. Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
trans-unit.target: Allah ħoloq il-smewwiet u l-earth fil-verità.

trans-unit.source: Recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater. And Allah knows that which you do.
trans-unit.target: Recite, [O Muhammad], dak li ġie żvelat lilek tal-Ktieb u jistabbilixxu talb.

trans-unit.source: And do not argue with the People of the Scripture except in a way that is best, except for those who commit injustice among them, and say, "We believe in that which has been revealed to us and revealed to you. And our God and your God is one; and we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."
trans-unit.target: U ma jaqbilx mal-Poplu ta 'l-Iskrittura ħlief b'mod li huwa l-aħjar, ħlief għal dawk li jikkommettu inġustizzja bejniethom, u jgħidu, "Aħna nemmnu fil dak li kien żvelat lilna u żvelat lilek. U Alla tagħna u

trans-unit.source: And thus We have sent down to you the Qur'an. And those to whom We [previously] gave the Scripture believe in it. And among these [people of Makkah] are those who believe in it. And none reject Our verses except the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: U għalhekk Aħna bagħtu stabbiliti lilek l Qur'an.

trans-unit.source: And you did not recite before it any scripture, nor did you inscribe one with your right hand. Otherwise the falsifiers would have had [cause for] doubt.
trans-unit.target: U inti ma telenkax quddiemha xi Iskrittura, u lanqas ma inti tpinġi waħda mal-lemin tiegħek.

trans-unit.source: Rather, the Qur'an is distinct verses [preserved] within the breasts of those who have been given knowledge. And none reject Our verses except the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Pjuttost, il-Qur'an huwa versi distinti [ippriservat] fi ħdan il-sider ta 'dawk li ngħataw għarfien.

trans-unit.source: But they say, "Why are not signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "The signs are only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Iżda jgħidu, "Għaliex ma huma sinjali mibgħuta isfel lilu mill Mulej tiegħu?"

trans-unit.source: And is it not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book which is recited to them? Indeed in that is a mercy and reminder for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: U huwa mhux biżżejjed għalihom li Aħna żvela li inti l-Ktieb li huwa recited lilhom?

trans-unit.source: Say, "Sufficient is Allah between me and you as Witness. He knows what is in the heavens and earth. And they who have believed in falsehood and disbelieved in Allah - it is those who are the losers."
trans-unit.target: Say, "suffiċjenti huwa Allah bejni u int bħala Xhud Jaf liema hu l-smewwiet u l-art U huma li jkunu emmnu falsità u disbelieved fil Allah -... Huwa dawk li huma l-telliefa"

trans-unit.source: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. And if not for [the decree of] a specified term, punishment would have reached them. But it will surely come to them suddenly while they perceive not.
trans-unit.target: U huma nitolbok biex iħaffu l-piena.

trans-unit.source: They urge you to hasten the punishment. And indeed, Hell will be encompassing of the disbelievers
trans-unit.target: Huma nitolbok biex iħaffu l-piena.

trans-unit.source: On the Day the punishment will cover them from above them and from below their feet and it is said, "Taste [the result of] what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Dwar il-Jum l-piena se tkopri lilhom minn fuq minnhom u minn taħt saqajn tagħhom u huwa qal, "Togħma [ir-riżultat ta] dak li inti użati biex jagħmlu."

trans-unit.source: O My servants who have believed, indeed My earth is spacious, so worship only Me.
trans-unit.target: O impjegati tiegħi li jemmnu, tabilħaqq art tiegħi hija spazjużi, tant qima biss Me.

trans-unit.source: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us will you be returned.
trans-unit.target: Kull ruħ se togħma mewt.

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - We will surely assign to them of Paradise [elevated] chambers beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers
trans-unit.target: U dawk li jemmnu u jsir atti twajbin - Aħna żgur li se jassenjawlhom ta Paradise [elevata] kmamar taħt liema xmajjar fluss, li fih huma jirrispettaw eternally.

trans-unit.source: Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely.
trans-unit.target: Li kienu pazjent u fuq l-Lord tagħhom jiddependu.

trans-unit.source: And how many a creature carries not its [own] provision. Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: U kemm kreatura twettaq ma tagħha dispożizzjoni [stess].

trans-unit.source: If you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth and subjected the sun and the moon?" they would surely say, "Allah." Then how are they deluded?
trans-unit.target: Jekk inti talbithom, "Min ħoloq l-smewwiet u l-earth u suġġetti x-xemx u l-qamar?"

trans-unit.source: Allah extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts for him. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Allah testendi dispożizzjoni għalihom Hu testmenti applikabbli għall-aġenti tiegħu u jirrestrinġi għalih.

trans-unit.source: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah." Say, "Praise to Allah "; but most of them do not reason.
trans-unit.target: U jekk inti talbithom, "Min jibgħat l isfel xita mis-sema u jagħti l-ħajja b'hekk lejn l-art wara lifelessness tagħha?"

trans-unit.source: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement. And indeed, the home of the Hereafter - that is the [eternal] life, if only they knew.
trans-unit.target: U din il-ħajja worldly mhix imma devjazzjoni u divertiment.

trans-unit.source: And when they board a ship, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, at once they associate others with Him
trans-unit.target: U meta ma jitilgħu fuq bastiment, ikunu supplicate Allah, sinċiera lilu fir-reliġjon.

trans-unit.source: So that they will deny what We have granted them, and they will enjoy themselves. But they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Sabiex dawn se jiċħdu dak Għandna mogħtija lilhom, u dawn se jgawdu infushom.

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We made [Makkah] a safe sanctuary, while people are being taken away all around them? Then in falsehood do they believe, and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
trans-unit.target: Have huma ma bbenefikawx dak Għamilna [Makkah] santwarju bla periklu, waqt li n-nies qed jittieħdu bogħod kollha ta 'madwarhom?

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a [sufficient] residence for the disbelievers?
trans-unit.target: U li huwa aktar indebitu minn wieħed li jivvinta gidba dwar Alla jew tiċħad il-verità meta dan wasal għall lilu?

trans-unit.source: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: U dawk li qed jirsistu għal Us - Aħna żgur li se jiggwida lill-modi tagħna.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Meem.

trans-unit.source: The Byzantines have been defeated
trans-unit.target: Il Byzantines ġew defeated

trans-unit.source: In the nearest land. But they, after their defeat, will overcome.
trans-unit.target: Fil-eqreb art.

trans-unit.source: Within three to nine years. To Allah belongs the command before and after. And that day the believers will rejoice
trans-unit.target: Fi żmien tliet sa disa 'snin.

trans-unit.source: In the victory of Allah. He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Fil-rebħa ta 'Allah.

trans-unit.source: [It is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: [Hija]-wegħda ta 'Alla.

trans-unit.source: They know what is apparent of the worldly life, but they, of the Hereafter, are unaware.
trans-unit.target: Huma jafu liema jirriżulta mill-ħajja worldly, iżda dawn, tal-Minn hawn, huma konxji.

trans-unit.source: Do they not contemplate within themselves? Allah has not created the heavens and the earth and what is between them except in truth and for a specified term. And indeed, many of the people, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Do mhux jikkontemplaw fihom infushom?

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? They were greater than them in power, and they plowed the earth and built it up more than they have built it up, and their messengers came to them with clear evidences. And Allah would not ever have wronged them, but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Have huma ma vvjaġġa matul l-art u osservati kif kien l-aħħar ta 'dawk quddiemhom?

trans-unit.source: Then the end of those who did evil was the worst [consequence] because they denied the signs of Allah and used to ridicule them.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad it-tarf ta 'dawk li għamlu ħażen kien l-agħar [konsegwenza] minħabba li ċaħad l-sinjali ta' Allah u użati biex redikolu lilhom.

trans-unit.source: Allah begins creation; then He will repeat it; then to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Allah jibda ħolqien;

trans-unit.source: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will be in despair.
trans-unit.target: U l-Jum il-Siegħa tidher l-kriminali se jkunu fil-disperazzjoni.

trans-unit.source: And there will not be for them among their [alleged] partners any intercessors, and they will [then] be disbelievers in their partners.
trans-unit.target: U mhux se jkun hemm għalihom fost l-imsieħba tagħhom [allegati] xi intercessors, u dawn se [imbagħad] ikun disbelievers fil imsieħba tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the Hour appears - that Day they will become separated.
trans-unit.target: U l-Jum l-Siegħa jidher - li Jum huma ser isiru separati.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted.
trans-unit.target: U għal dawk li kienu emmnu u jsir atti twajbin, dawn se jkunu fil-ġnien [ta 'Paradise], kuntenta a.

trans-unit.source: But as for those who disbelieved and denied Our verses and the meeting of the Hereafter, those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].
trans-unit.target: Iżda għal dawk li disbelieved u ċaħad versi tagħna u l-laqgħa tal-Minn hawn, dawn se jiddaħħlu fil-piena [li tibqa].

trans-unit.source: So exalted is Allah when you reach the evening and when you reach the morning.
trans-unit.target: Allura exalted huwa Allah meta inti tilħaq l-għaxija u meta inti tilħaq il-għodu.

trans-unit.source: And to Him is [due all] praise throughout the heavens and the earth. And [exalted is He] at night and when you are at noon.
trans-unit.target: U lilu huwa [dovuta kollha] tifħir matul l-smewwiet u l-earth.

trans-unit.source: He brings the living out of the dead and brings the dead out of the living and brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. And thus will you be brought out.
trans-unit.target: Hu jġib l-għajxien mill-mejjet u ġġib il-mejtin barra mill-ħajjin u ġġib għall-ħajja tad-dinja wara lifelessness tagħha.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that He created you from dust; then, suddenly you were human beings dispersing [throughout the earth].
trans-unit.target: U ta 'sinjali Tiegħu huwa li Hu maħluqa għalik mit-trab;

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: U ta 'sinjali Tiegħu huwa li Hu maħluqa għalik minn mates infuskom li inti tista' ssib trankwillità fihom;

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth and the diversity of your languages and your colors. Indeed in that are signs for those of knowledge.
trans-unit.target: U ta 'sinjali Tiegħu huwa l-ħolqien tal-franki u l-earth u d-diversità tal-lingwi tiegħek u kuluri tiegħek.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is your sleep by night and day and your seeking of His bounty. Indeed in that are signs for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: U ta 'sinjali Tiegħu huwa l-irqad tiegħek bil-lejl u nhar u jfittxu tiegħek ta' Bounty Tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is [that] He shows you the lightning [causing] fear and aspiration, and He sends down rain from the sky by which He brings to life the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that are signs for a people who use reason.
trans-unit.target: U ta 'sinjali Tiegħu huwa [li] Huwa juri li inti l-sajjetti [jikkawżaw] biża' u aspirazzjoni, u Hu jibgħat l isfel xita mis-sema li bih Hu jġib għall-ħajja tad-dinja wara lifelessness tagħha.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that the heaven and earth remain by His command. Then when He calls you with a [single] call from the earth, immediately you will come forth.
trans-unit.target: U ta 'sinjali Tiegħu huwa li l-ġenna u earth jibqa bi kmand tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: And to Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and earth. All are to Him devoutly obedient.
trans-unit.target: U lilu tappartjeni min hu fil-smewwiet u l-earth.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who begins creation; then He repeats it, and that is [even] easier for Him. To Him belongs the highest attribute in the heavens and earth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: U huwa Hu li jibda ħolqien;

trans-unit.source: He presents to you an example from yourselves. Do you have among those whom your right hands possess any partners in what We have provided for you so that you are equal therein [and] would fear them as your fear of one another [within a partnership]? Thus do We detail the verses for a people who use reason.
trans-unit.target: Huwa jippreżenta lilek eżempju mill yourselves.

trans-unit.source: But those who wrong follow their [own] desires without knowledge. Then who can guide one whom Allah has sent astray? And for them there are no helpers.
trans-unit.target: Iżda dawk li ħażina jsegwu [proprji] tagħhom jixtieq mingħajr l-għarfien.

trans-unit.source: So direct your face toward the religion, inclining to truth. [Adhere to] the fitrah of Allah upon which He has created [all] people. No change should there be in the creation of Allah. That is the correct religion, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Allura dirett wiċċ tiegħek lejn l-reliġjon, jinklina għall-verità.

trans-unit.source: [Adhere to it], turning in repentance to Him, and fear Him and establish prayer and do not be of those who associate others with Allah
trans-unit.target: [Jaderixxu għaliha], tidwir fil indiema lilu, u biża lilu u jistabbilixxu talb u ma jkun ta 'dawk li jassoċjaw oħrajn ma Allah

trans-unit.source: [Or] of those who have divided their religion and become sects, every faction rejoicing in what it has.
trans-unit.target: [Jew] ta 'dawk li maqsuma reliġjon tagħhom u jsiru settet, kull fazzjoni rejoicing fil dak li jkun.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches the people, they call upon their Lord, turning in repentance to Him. Then when He lets them taste mercy from Him, at once a party of them associate others with their Lord,
trans-unit.target: U meta diffikultajiet jmiss il-poplu, huma jitolbu lill-Mulej tagħhom, tidwir fil indiema lilu.

trans-unit.source: So that they will deny what We have granted them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Sabiex dawn se jiċħdu dak Għandna mogħtija lilhom.

trans-unit.source: Or have We sent down to them an authority, and it speaks of what they were associating with Him?
trans-unit.target: Jew ikollhom Aħna mibgħuta isfel lilhom xi awtorità, u titkellem ta 'dak li kienu jassoċjaw mal miegħu?

trans-unit.source: And when We let the people taste mercy, they rejoice therein, but if evil afflicts them for what their hands have put forth, immediately they despair.
trans-unit.target: U meta Aħna ħalli l-poplu togħma ħniena, dawn tiċċelebra hemmhekk, imma jekk ħażen afflicts minnhom għal dak l-idejn tagħhom mressqa raba, immedjatament dawn disperazzjoni.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed, in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Do huma ma jaraw li Allah testendi dispożizzjoni għalihom Hu testmenti u jirrestrinġi [hija]?

trans-unit.source: So give the relative his right, as well as the needy and the traveler. That is best for those who desire the countenance of Allah, and it is they who will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: Allura tagħti l-qarib dritt tiegħu, kif ukoll il-bżonn u l-vjaġġatur.

trans-unit.source: And whatever you give for interest to increase within the wealth of people will not increase with Allah. But what you give in zakah, desiring the countenance of Allah - those are the multipliers.
trans-unit.target: U tkun xi tkun inti tagħti għall-interess li tiżdied fi ħdan il-ġid ta 'nies mhux se jiżdied ma' Alla.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the one who created you, then provided for you, then will cause you to die, and then will give you life. Are there any of your "partners" who does anything of that? Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Alla huwa l-waħda li ħolqu għalik, allura pprovduti għalik, allura se kawża li jmutu, u mbagħad se jtik ħajja.

trans-unit.source: Corruption has appeared throughout the land and sea by [reason of] what the hands of people have earned so He may let them taste part of [the consequence of] what they have done that perhaps they will return [to righteousness].
trans-unit.target: Korruzzjoni deher matul l-art u l-baħar minn [abba] liema f'idejn il-poplu jkunu qalgħu hekk Huwa jista 'jħallu lilhom togħma parti ta' [l-konsegwenza ta '] dak li għamlu li forsi dawn ser jirritornaw [biex tjieba].

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of those before. Most of them were associators [of others with Allah].
trans-unit.target: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel permezz tal-art u josservaw kif kien l-aħħar ta 'dawk qabel. Ħafna minnhom kienu associators [ta' ħaddieħor bi Allah].

trans-unit.source: So direct your face toward the correct religion before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. That Day, they will be divided.
trans-unit.target: Allura dirett wiċċ tiegħek lejn l-reliġjon korretta qabel Jum ġej minn Alla li m'hemm l-ebda repelling.

trans-unit.source: Whoever disbelieves - upon him is [the consequence of] his disbelief. And whoever does righteousness - they are for themselves preparing,
trans-unit.target: Kulmin disbelieves - lilu huwa [-konsegwenza ta] disbelief tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: That He may reward those who have believed and done righteous deeds out of His bounty. Indeed, He does not like the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Li Hu jista 'tippremja lil dawk li kienu jemmnu u għamlu atti twajbin minn Bounty Tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: And of His signs is that He sends the winds as bringers of good tidings and to let you taste His mercy and so the ships may sail at His command and so you may seek of His bounty, and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: U ta 'sinjali Tiegħu huwa li Hu jibgħat l-irjieħ bħala bringers ta tidings tajba u biex let inti togħma ħniena tiegħu u għalhekk il-vapuri jistgħu ibaħħru fil-kmand tiegħu u għalhekk inti tista' tfittex tar Bounty Tiegħu, u forsi inti tkun grat.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you to their peoples, and they came to them with clear evidences; then We took retribution from those who committed crimes, and incumbent upon Us was support of the believers.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna diġà bagħtu messaġġiera qabel inti popli tagħhom, u li waslu biex bl provi ċari;

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds and spread them in the sky however He wills, and He makes them fragments so you see the rain emerge from within them. And when He causes it to fall upon whom He wills of His servants, immediately they rejoice
trans-unit.target: Huwa Alla li tibgħat l-irjieħ, u dawn ħawwad il-sħab u t-tixrid tagħhom fil-sema Madankollu, huwa testmenti, u Hu jagħmilhom tifframmenta sabiex inti tara l-xita joħorġu minn ġewwa fihom.

trans-unit.source: Although they were, before it was sent down upon them - before that, in despair.
trans-unit.target: Għalkemm dawn kienu, qabel ma ntbagħat l fuq minnhom - qabel dik, fil-disperazzjoni.

trans-unit.source: So observe the effects of the mercy of Allah - how He gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed, that [same one] will give life to the dead, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Allura josservaw l-effetti tal-ħniena ta 'Alla - kif Hu jagħti l-ħajja lill-art wara lifelessness tagħha.

trans-unit.source: But if We should send a [bad] wind and they saw [their crops] turned yellow, they would remain thereafter disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Imma jekk Għandna tibgħat [ħażina] riħ u raw [uċuħ tagħhom] daru isfar, dawn jibqgħu wara disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: So indeed, you will not make the dead hear, nor will you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs, retreating.
trans-unit.target: Allura fil-fatt, inti mhux ser tagħmel l tisma mejtin, u lanqas se inti tagħmel l-torox jisimgħu l-sejħa meta dawn jibdlu daharhom, jirtiraw.

trans-unit.source: And you cannot guide the blind away from their error. You will only make hear those who believe in Our verses so they are Muslims [in submission to Allah].
trans-unit.target: U inti ma tistax jiggwidaw il-għomja bogħod mill-iżball tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the one who created you from weakness, then made after weakness strength, then made after strength weakness and white hair. He creates what He wills, and He is the Knowing, the Competent.
trans-unit.target: Alla huwa l-waħda li ħoloq int mill dgħjufija, imbagħad għamlet wara qawwa dgħjufija, imbagħad isir wara dgħjufija saħħa u xagħar abjad.

trans-unit.source: And the Day the Hour appears the criminals will swear they had remained but an hour. Thus they were deluded.
trans-unit.target: U l-Jum il-Siegħa tidher l-kriminali se naħlef li kienu baqgħu iżda siegħa.

trans-unit.source: But those who were given knowledge and faith will say, "You remained the extent of Allah 's decree until the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection, but you did not used to know."
trans-unit.target: Iżda dawk li ngħataw għarfien u l-fidi se ngħid, "Inti baqgħet l-estent ta 'digriet tal Allah sal-Jum ta' Resurrection, u dan huwa l-Jum ta 'Resurrection, imma inti ma jiġux użati biex tkun taf."

trans-unit.source: So that Day, their excuse will not benefit those who wronged, nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Allura li Jum, skuża tagħhom mhux se jibbenefikaw dawk li inġurjati, lanqas m'huma se jkunu mitluba li appease [Allah].

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly presented to the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example. But, [O Muhammad], if you should bring them a sign, the disbelievers will surely say, "You [believers] are but falsifiers."
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ċertament ippreżenta lill-poplu f'dan il Qur'an minn kull [tip ta '] Eżempju.

trans-unit.source: Thus does Allah seal the hearts of those who do not know.
trans-unit.target: B'hekk ma Allah tissiġilla l-qlub ta 'dawk li ma jafux.

trans-unit.source: So be patient. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And let them not disquiet you who are not certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: Sabiex jiġi pazjent.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Meem.

trans-unit.source: These are verses of the wise Book,
trans-unit.target: Dawn huma versi tal-Ktieb għaqli,

trans-unit.source: As guidance and mercy for the doers of good
trans-unit.target: Bħala gwida u l-ħniena għall-malfatturi tal-tajba

trans-unit.source: Who establish prayer and give zakah, and they, of the Hereafter, are certain [in faith].
trans-unit.target: Min jistabbilixxu talb u jagħtu zakah, u dawn, min hawn 'il quddiem, huma ċerti [in mala].

trans-unit.source: Those are on [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Dawk huma dwar gwida [dritt] minn Mulej tagħhom, u huwa dawk li huma l-suċċess.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who buys the amusement of speech to mislead [others] from the way of Allah without knowledge and who takes it in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: U l-poplu huwa hu li jixtri l-divertiment tal-kelma li jqarraq [ħaddieħor] mill-mod ta 'Allah mingħajr l-għarfien u li tikkonsidraha fil redikolu.

trans-unit.source: And when our verses are recited to him, he turns away arrogantly as if he had not heard them, as if there was in his ears deafness. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: U meta versi tagħna huma recited lilu, huwa dawriet bogħod arrogantly bħallikieku huwa ma kienx sema minnhom, bħallikieku kien hemm fil-widnejn truxija tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, dawk li jemmnu u jagħmlu atti twajbin - għalihom huma l-Ġonna ta 'divertiment.

trans-unit.source: Wherein they abide eternally; [it is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Fih huma jirrispettaw eternally;

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens without pillars that you see and has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with you, and dispersed therein from every creature. And We sent down rain from the sky and made grow therein [plants] of every noble kind.
trans-unit.target: Huwa ħoloq l-smewwiet mingħajr pilastri li tara u mitfugħa fl-art stabbiliti b'mod sod muntanji, lest għandu bidla miegħek, u mxerrda hemmhekk minn kull kreatura.

trans-unit.source: This is the creation of Allah. So show Me what those other than Him have created. Rather, the wrongdoers are in clear error.
trans-unit.target: Dan huwa l-ħolqien ta 'Allah.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Luqman wisdom [and said], "Be grateful to Allah." And whoever is grateful is grateful for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever denies [His favor] - then indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: U Kellna ċertament mogħti għerf Luqman [u qal], "Grat li Allah."

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Luqman said to his son while he was instructing him, "O my son, do not associate [anything] with Allah. Indeed, association [with him] is great injustice."
trans-unit.target: U [isemmu, O Muhammad], meta Luqman qal lil ibnu waqt li kien istruzzjoni lilu, "O iben tiegħi, ma jassoċjaw [xejn] ma Allah. Tabilħaqq, l-assoċjazzjoni [miegħu] hija inġustizzja kbira."

trans-unit.source: And We have enjoined upon man [care] for his parents. His mother carried him, [increasing her] in weakness upon weakness, and his weaning is in two years. Be grateful to Me and to your parents; to Me is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna ordnat lill-bniedem [kura] għall-ġenituri tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them but accompany them in [this] world with appropriate kindness and follow the way of those who turn back to Me [in repentance]. Then to Me will be your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Iżda jekk dawn jagħmlu sforz biex tagħmel inti tassoċja ma 'Me dak li tiegħu għandek l-ebda għarfien, ma jobdux minnhom iżda jakkumpanjawhom f' [dan] l-dinja ma kindness xierqa u jsegwu l-mod ta 'dawk li jduru lura lill Me [fil indiema].

trans-unit.source: [And Luqman said], "O my son, indeed if wrong should be the weight of a mustard seed and should be within a rock or [anywhere] in the heavens or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: [U Luqman qal], "O iben tiegħi, tabilħaqq jekk żbaljat għandu jkun il-piż ta 'żerriegħa tal-mustarda u għandha ssir fi blat jew [kullimkien] fil-smewwiet jew fl-art, Allah se jġibu raba. Tabilħaqq, Alla huwa

trans-unit.source: O my son, establish prayer, enjoin what is right, forbid what is wrong, and be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, [all] that is of the matters [requiring] determination.
trans-unit.target: O iben tiegħi, tistabbilixxi talb, ordnat dak li huwa dritt, jipprojbixxu dak li hu ħażin, u tkun pazjent fuq dak befalls inti.

trans-unit.source: And do not turn your cheek [in contempt] toward people and do not walk through the earth exultantly. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.
trans-unit.target: U ma dawran ħaddejn tiegħek [disprezz] lejn nies u ma jimxu permezz tal-art exultantly.

trans-unit.source: And be moderate in your pace and lower your voice; indeed, the most disagreeable of sounds is the voice of donkeys."
trans-unit.target: U tkun moderata fil-pass tiegħek u t'isfel vuċi tiegħek;

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has made subject to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth and amply bestowed upon you His favors, [both] apparent and unapparent? But of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening Book [from Him].
trans-unit.target: Inti ma tara li Allah għamlet suġġetta lilek kollu li hu fil-smewwiet u dak kollu li huwa fl-art u ampjament octroyé fuqkom jippreferi tiegħu, [kemm] apparenti u unapparent?

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers." Even if Satan was inviting them to the punishment of the Blaze?
trans-unit.target: U meta huwa qal lilhom, "Follow dak Allah żvelat," jgħidu, "Pjuttost, aħna ser issegwi dik li fuqha sibna missirijietna."

trans-unit.source: And whoever submits his face to Allah while he is a doer of good - then he has grasped the most trustworthy handhold. And to Allah will be the outcome of [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: U min jissottometti wiċċu li Allah waqt li jkun doer ta 'tajba - allura hu jkun ħatfu l-qabda l-aktar affidabbli.

trans-unit.source: And whoever has disbelieved - let not his disbelief grieve you. To Us is their return, and We will inform them of what they did. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: U min ikun disbelieved - ejja ma disbelief tiegħu Grieve inti.

trans-unit.source: We grant them enjoyment for a little; then We will force them to a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: Aħna jagħtihom tgawdija għal ftit;

trans-unit.source: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "[All] praise is [due] to Allah "; but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: U jekk inti talbithom, "Min ħoloq l-smewwiet u l-art?"

trans-unit.source: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. Indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Li Allah jappartjeni kollu li hu fil-smewwiet u l-earth.

trans-unit.source: And if whatever trees upon the earth were pens and the sea [was ink], replenished thereafter by seven [more] seas, the words of Allah would not be exhausted. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: U jekk ikun x'ikun siġar fuq l-art kienu pinen u l-baħar [kienet linka], riforniti wara dan b'sebgħa [aktar] ibħra, il-kliem ta 'Alla ma jiġux eżawriti.

trans-unit.source: Your creation and your resurrection will not be but as that of a single soul. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: ħolqien tiegħek u l-qawmien tiegħek mhux se tkun, imma bħala dak ta 'ruħ waħda.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term, and that Allah, with whatever you do, is Acquainted?
trans-unit.target: Inti ma tara li Alla tikkawża l-lejl jidħol il-jum u jikkaġuna l-jum li jidħlu fil-lejl u soġġett x-xemx u l-qamar, kull running [kors tiegħu] għal terminu speċifiku, u li Allah, bi kwalunkwe inti tagħmel,

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that what they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: Dan huwa għaliex Alla huwa l-Verità, u li dak li huma jsejħu lill għajr lilu hija falsità, u minħabba Alla huwa l-Għoli, il-Kbir.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the favor of Allah that He may show you of His signs? Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: Inti ma tara li l-bastimenti jbaħħru matul il-baħar mill-favur ta 'Alla li Hu jista jurik ta' sinjali Tiegħu?

trans-unit.source: And when waves come over them like canopies, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, there are [some] of them who are moderate [in faith]. And none rejects Our signs except everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: U meta mewġ jiġi maż minnhom bħal tined, dawn supplicate Allah, sinċiera lilu fir-reliġjon.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord and fear a Day when no father will avail his son, nor will a son avail his father at all. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.
trans-unit.target: umanità O, il-biża Mulej tiegħek u biża Jum meta l-ebda missier se japprofittaw ibnu, lanqas m'huma se iben japprofittaw missieru fil-livelli kollha.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah [alone] has knowledge of the Hour and sends down the rain and knows what is in the wombs. And no soul perceives what it will earn tomorrow, and no soul perceives in what land it will die. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, Allah [waħedha] għandha għarfien tal-Siegħa u jibgħat l-xita u jaf liema hu l-wombs.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Meem.

trans-unit.source: [This is] the revelation of the Book about which there is no doubt from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: [Dan huwa] l-rivelazzjoni tal-Ktieb dwar liema m'hemm l-ebda dubju mill-Mulej ta 'l-dinjiet.

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He invented it"? Rather, it is the truth from your Lord, [O Muhammad], that you may warn a people to whom no warner has come before you [so] perhaps they will be guided.
trans-unit.target: Jew ma huma jgħidu, "Hu ivvintat dan"?

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them in six days; then He established Himself above the Throne. You have not besides Him any protector or any intercessor; so will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Huwa Alla li ħolqu l-smewwiet u l-earth u tkun xi tkun bejniethom f'sitt ijiem;

trans-unit.source: He arranges [each] matter from the heaven to the earth; then it will ascend to Him in a Day, the extent of which is a thousand years of those which you count.
trans-unit.target: Huwa tirranġa [kull] jimpurtax mill-sema l-earth;

trans-unit.source: That is the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
trans-unit.target: Dan huwa l-knower tal-tidhirx u l rat, il Exalted fil Jista, il ħniena,

trans-unit.source: Who perfected everything which He created and began the creation of man from clay.
trans-unit.target: Min pperfezzjonat dak kollox li Huwa ħoloq u beda l-ħolqien tal-bniedem minn tafal.

trans-unit.source: Then He made his posterity out of the extract of a liquid disdained.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Hu għamel posterità tiegħu barra mill-estratt ta 'likwidu disdained.

trans-unit.source: Then He proportioned him and breathed into him from His [created] soul and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad Huwa proporzjonati lilu u nefaħ fil lilu mill Tiegħu ruħ [maħluqa] u magħmula ghalik smigħ u viżjoni u qlub;

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When we are lost within the earth, will we indeed be [recreated] in a new creation?" Rather, they are, in [the matter of] the meeting with their Lord, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: U jgħidu, "Meta aħna qed jintilfu fi ħdan l-earth, li nkunu tassew ikunu [recreated] fi ħolqien ġdid?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "The angel of death will take you who has been entrusted with you. Then to your Lord you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: Say, "L-anġlu tal-mewt se tieħu inti li ġiet fdata miegħek. Imbagħad lil Lord tiegħek inti ser tkun mibgħuta lura."

trans-unit.source: If you could but see when the criminals are hanging their heads before their Lord, [saying], "Our Lord, we have seen and heard, so return us [to the world]; we will work righteousness. Indeed, we are [now] certain."
trans-unit.target: Jekk inti tista ', iżda tara meta l-kriminali huma mdendlin kapijiet tagħhom qabel Mulej tagħhom, [qal], "Mulej tagħna, rajna u smajna, hekk jirritornaw lilna [għad-dinja]; se naħdmu tjieba Tabilħaqq, aħna [issa.

trans-unit.source: And if We had willed, We could have given every soul its guidance, but the word from Me will come into effect [that] "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and people all together.
trans-unit.target: U jekk Kellna willed, Stajna taw kull ruħ gwida tagħha, iżda l-kelma minn Me se jidħlu fis-seħħ [li] "Jien żgur li se jimlew infern ma jinn u n-nies kollha flimkien.

trans-unit.source: So taste [punishment] because you forgot the meeting of this, your Day; indeed, We have [accordingly] forgotten you. And taste the punishment of eternity for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Allura togħma [piena] għax inti nesa l-laqgħa ta 'dan il-Jum tiegħek;

trans-unit.source: Only those believe in Our verses who, when they are reminded by them, fall down in prostration and exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord, and they are not arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Biss dawk jemmnu fil versi tagħna li, meta jkunu mfakkra minnhom, jaqgħu fl-prostrazzjoni u teżalta [Allah] bl tifħir ta 'Lord tagħhom, u dawn mhumiex arroganti.

trans-unit.source: They arise from [their] beds; they supplicate their Lord in fear and aspiration, and from what We have provided them, they spend.
trans-unit.target: Dawn jinħolqu mill-sodod [tagħhom];

trans-unit.source: And no soul knows what has been hidden for them of comfort for eyes as reward for what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: U l-ebda ruħ jaf dak li ġie moħbi għalihom ta 'kumdità għall-għajnejn bħala premju għal dak li huma użati biex jagħmlu.

trans-unit.source: Then is one who was a believer like one who was defiantly disobedient? They are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Imbagħad huwa wieħed li kien fidi bħal wieħed li kien defiantly disobedient?

trans-unit.source: As for those who believed and did righteous deeds, for them will be the Gardens of Refuge as accommodation for what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Fir-rigward dawk li jemmnu u ma atti twajbin, għalihom se jkunu l-Ġonna ta 'Rifuġju bħala akkommodazzjoni għal dak li huma użati biex jagħmlu.

trans-unit.source: But as for those who defiantly disobeyed, their refuge is the Fire. Every time they wish to emerge from it, they will be returned to it while it is said to them, "Taste the punishment of the Fire which you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Iżda għal dawk li defiantly kiser, kenn tagħhom hija l-Nar.

trans-unit.source: And we will surely let them taste the nearer punishment short of the greater punishment that perhaps they will repent.
trans-unit.target: U aħna żgur li se jħallu lilhom togħma-qosor piena eqreb tal-piena akbar li forsi dawn se jindem.

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord; then he turns away from them? Indeed We, from the criminals, will take retribution.
trans-unit.target: U li huwa aktar indebitu minn wieħed li għandu jżomm f'moħħu l-versi ta 'Lord tiegħu;

trans-unit.source: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel.
trans-unit.target: U Aħna żgur taw Mose l-Iskrittura, sabiex ma jkun hemm dubju fuq l-laqgħa tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and [when] they were certain of Our signs.
trans-unit.target: U Għamilna minn fosthom mexxejja gwida bi kmand tagħna meta kienu pazjent u [meta] dawn kienu uħud mill-sinjali tagħna.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, Mulej tiegħek ser jiġġudikaw bejniethom dwar il-Jum ta 'Resurrection dwar dak li fuqha huma użati li jkunu differenti.

trans-unit.source: Has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them, [as] they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs; then do they not hear?
trans-unit.target: Has jkunx sar ċar għalihom kemm ġenerazzjonijiet Aħna meqruda quddiemhom, [kif] walk fost residenzi tagħhom?

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We drive the water [in clouds] to barren land and bring forth thereby crops from which their livestock eat and [they] themselves? Then do they not see?
trans-unit.target: Have huma ma bbenefikawx li Aħna sewqan l-ilma [fil-sħab] art għerja u jġibu raba b'hekk uċuħ tagħhom jieklu bhejjem tagħhom u [huma] infushom?

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: U jgħidu, "Meta se jkun dan konkwista, jekk inti għandek tkun veritiera?"

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved."
trans-unit.target: Say, [O Muhammad], "Fuq il-Jum ta 'Conquest-twemmin ta' dawk li kienu disbelieved mhux se jibbenefikaw minnhom, lanqas m'huma se jiġu reprieved."

trans-unit.source: So turn away from them and wait. Indeed, they are waiting.
trans-unit.target: Allura dawwar bogħod minnhom u stenna.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O Profeta, biża Allah u ma jobdu l-disbelievers u l-hypocrites.

trans-unit.source: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: U jsegwu dak li huwa żvelat lilek minn Lord tiegħek.

trans-unit.source: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: U jiddependu fuq Allah;

trans-unit.source: Allah has not made for a man two hearts in his interior. And He has not made your wives whom you declare unlawful your mothers. And he has not made your adopted sons your [true] sons. That is [merely] your saying by your mouths, but Allah says the truth, and He guides to the [right] way.
trans-unit.target: Allah ma jkunx għamel għal bniedem żewġ qlub fl-intern tiegħu.

trans-unit.source: Call them by [the names of] their fathers; it is more just in the sight of Allah. But if you do not know their fathers - then they are [still] your brothers in religion and those entrusted to you. And there is no blame upon you for that in which you have erred but [only for] what your hearts intended. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Jsejħulhom minn [l-ismijiet ta '] missirijiethom;

trans-unit.source: The Prophet is more worthy of the believers than themselves, and his wives are [in the position of] their mothers. And those of [blood] relationship are more entitled [to inheritance] in the decree of Allah than the [other] believers and the emigrants, except that you may do to your close associates a kindness [through bequest]. That was in the Book inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Il-Profeta huwa aktar denja ta 'l-twemmin milli infushom, u wives tiegħu huma [fil-pożizzjoni ta'] ommijiethom.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We took from the prophets their covenant and from you and from Noah and Abraham and Moses and Jesus, the son of Mary; and We took from them a solemn covenant.
trans-unit.target: U [isemmu, O Muhammad], meta Aħna ħa mill-profeti patt tagħhom u minn int u minn Noah u Abraham u Mosè u Ġesù, l-iben ta 'Marija;

trans-unit.source: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Dak Hu jistgħu jikkontestaw il-verità dwar il-verità tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when armies came to [attack] you and We sent upon them a wind and armies [of angels] you did not see. And ever is Allah, of what you do, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: O inti li jemmnu, ftakar l-favur ta 'Allah fuqkom meta armati waslet għal [attakk] lilek u Aħna bagħtu fuqhom riħ u armati [ta' anġli] inti ma tara.

trans-unit.source: [Remember] when they came at you from above you and from below you, and when eyes shifted [in fear], and hearts reached the throats and you assumed about Allah [various] assumptions.
trans-unit.target: [Ftakar] meta dawn ġew fi inti minn fuq int u minn taħt inti, u meta l-għajnejn mċaqlaq [fil-biża], u qlub laħqu l-grieżem u inti jassumi dwar Allah assunzjonijiet [varji].

trans-unit.source: There the believers were tested and shaken with a severe shaking.
trans-unit.target: Hemm l-twemmin ġew ittestjati u jitħawwad ma 'tħawwad severa.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when the hypocrites and those in whose hearts is disease said, "Allah and His Messenger did not promise us except delusion,"
trans-unit.target: U [ftakar] meta l-hypocrites u dawk li fil-qlub hi marda qal, "Allah u Messenger Tiegħu ma wegħda lilna ħlief delużjoni,"

trans-unit.source: And when a faction of them said, "O people of Yathrib, there is no stability for you [here], so return [home]." And a party of them asked permission of the Prophet, saying, "Indeed, our houses are unprotected," while they were not exposed. They did not intend except to flee.
trans-unit.target: U meta fazzjoni minnhom qal, "O nies ta Yathrib, m'hemm l-ebda stabbiltà għalik [hawn], hekk jirritorna [dar]."

trans-unit.source: And if they had been entered upon from all its [surrounding] regions and fitnah had been demanded of them, they would have done it and not hesitated over it except briefly.
trans-unit.target: U jekk dawn kienu ġew imdaħħla fuq minn dak kollu tiegħu [jdawwar] reājuni u fitnah kienu mitluba minnhom, huma għamlu dan u mhux qagħditx taħsibha fuqha ħlief fil-qosor.

trans-unit.source: And they had already promised Allah before not to turn their backs and flee. And ever is the promise to Allah [that about which one will be] questioned.
trans-unit.target: U huma kienu diġà mwiegħda Allah qabel ma jduru daharhom u jaħarbu.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Never will fleeing benefit you if you should flee from death or killing; and then [if you did], you would not be given enjoyment [of life] except for a little."
trans-unit.target: Say, [O Muhammad], "Qatt ser jibbenefikaw jaħarbu jekk għandek jaħarbu mill-mewt jew il-qtil; u mbagħad [jekk inti ma], inti ma tingħata tgawdija [tal-ħajja] ħlief għal ftit."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is it that can protect you from Allah if He intends for you an ill or intends for you a mercy?" And they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Say, "Min hu dan li jista 'tipproteġik minn Allah jekk Hu l-ħsieb għalik xi marid jew ikun beħsiebu għalik ħniena?"

trans-unit.source: Already Allah knows the hinderers among you and those [hypocrites] who say to their brothers, "Come to us," and do not go to battle, except for a few,
trans-unit.target: Diġà Alla jaf il-hinderers fostkom u dawk [hypocrites] li jgħidu li aħwa tagħhom, "Come lilna," u ma jmorrux lil battalja, ħlief għal xi ftit,

trans-unit.source: Indisposed toward you. And when fear comes, you see them looking at you, their eyes revolving like one being overcome by death. But when fear departs, they lash you with sharp tongues, indisposed toward [any] good. Those have not believed, so Allah has rendered their deeds worthless, and ever is that, for Allah, easy.
trans-unit.target: Indispost lejkom.

trans-unit.source: They think the companies have not [yet] withdrawn. And if the companies should come [again], they would wish they were in the desert among the bedouins, inquiring [from afar] about your news. And if they should be among you, they would not fight except for a little.
trans-unit.target: Huma jaħsbu l-kumpaniji ma [għadhom] irtirat.

trans-unit.source: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day and [who] remembers Allah often.
trans-unit.target: Hemm ċertament kien għalik fil-Messenger ta 'Allah mudell eċċellenti għal dawk kollha li l-tama hija fil Allah u l-Jum l-aħħar u [li] jiftakar Allah spiss.

trans-unit.source: And when the believers saw the companies, they said, "This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us, and Allah and His Messenger spoke the truth." And it increased them only in faith and acceptance.
trans-unit.target: U meta l-twemmin raw il-kumpaniji, huma qalu, "Dan huwa dak li Alla u Messenger Tiegħu kien imwiegħed magħna, u Allah u Messenger Tiegħu tkellem il-verità."

trans-unit.source: Among the believers are men true to what they promised Allah. Among them is he who has fulfilled his vow [to the death], and among them is he who awaits [his chance]. And they did not alter [the terms of their commitment] by any alteration -
trans-unit.target: Fost l-twemmin huma rġiel veru li dak li wiegħed Alla.

trans-unit.source: That Allah may reward the truthful for their truth and punish the hypocrites if He wills or accept their repentance. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Dak Allah jista 'tippremja l-veri għall-verità tagħhom u jikkastigaw l-hypocrites jekk Hu testmenti jew jaċċettaw indiema tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: And Allah repelled those who disbelieved, in their rage, not having obtained any good. And sufficient was Allah for the believers in battle, and ever is Allah Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: U Alla repelled dawk li disbelieved, fil Rage tagħhom, li ma kisbu ebda tajba.

trans-unit.source: And He brought down those who supported them among the People of the Scripture from their fortresses and cast terror into their hearts [so that] a party you killed, and you took captive a party.
trans-unit.target: U Hu waqqa dawk li appoġġja lilhom fost il-Poplu l-Iskrittura mill-fortizzi tagħhom u mitfugħa terrur fil-qlub tagħhom [sabiex] parti tista maqtula, u int ħa captive parti.

trans-unit.source: And He caused you to inherit their land and their homes and their properties and a land which you have not trodden. And ever is Allah, over all things, competent.
trans-unit.target: U Hu ikkawżat inti jirtu l-art tagħhom u djarhom u l-proprjetajiet tagħhom u l-art li int ma trodden.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, say to your wives, "If you should desire the worldly life and its adornment, then come, I will provide for you and give you a gracious release.
trans-unit.target: O Profeta, jgħidu li nisa tiegħek, "Jekk għandek xewqa tal-ħajja worldly u tiżjin tiegħu, imbagħad come, jien ser jipprovdu għalik u jagħtuk rilaxx gracious.

trans-unit.source: But if you should desire Allah and His Messenger and the home of the Hereafter - then indeed, Allah has prepared for the doers of good among you a great reward."
trans-unit.target: Imma jekk inti għandek xewqa Allah u Messenger Tiegħu u l-dar tal-Minn hawn - imbagħad tabilħaqq, Allah tkun ippreparat għall-malfatturi tal-tajba fostkom premju kbir ".

trans-unit.source: O wives of the Prophet, whoever of you should commit a clear immorality - for her the punishment would be doubled two fold, and ever is that, for Allah, easy.
trans-unit.target: nisa O tal-Profeta, min minnkom għandu jikkommetti immoralità ċara - għall tagħha l-piena tkun irduppjat tnejn darbiet, u qatt huwa li, għal Allah, faċli.

trans-unit.source: And whoever of you devoutly obeys Allah and His Messenger and does righteousness - We will give her her reward twice; and We have prepared for her a noble provision.
trans-unit.target: U min minnkom devoutly tobdi Allah u Messenger Tiegħu u ma tjieba - Aħna se tagħti tagħha premju tagħha darbtejn;

trans-unit.source: O wives of the Prophet, you are not like anyone among women. If you fear Allah, then do not be soft in speech [to men], lest he in whose heart is disease should covet, but speak with appropriate speech.
trans-unit.target: nisa O tal-Profeta, inti ma simili xi ħadd fost in-nisa.

trans-unit.source: And abide in your houses and do not display yourselves as [was] the display of the former times of ignorance. And establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. Allah intends only to remove from you the impurity [of sin], O people of the [Prophet's] household, and to purify you with [extensive] purification.
trans-unit.target: U joqogħdu fi djar tiegħek u ma jurux infuskom bħala [kienet] il-wiri ta 'l-żminijiet ta' qabel ta 'injoranza.

trans-unit.source: And remember what is recited in your houses of the verses of Allah and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Subtle and Acquainted [with all things].
trans-unit.target: U ftakar dak li huwa recited fid-djar tiegħek ta 'l-versi ta' Allah u l-għerf.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Muslim men and Muslim women, the believing men and believing women, the obedient men and obedient women, the truthful men and truthful women, the patient men and patient women, the humble men and humble women, the charitable men and charitable women, the fasting men and fasting women, the men who guard their private parts and the women who do so, and the men who remember Allah often and the women who do so - for them Allah has prepared forgiveness and a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Tabilħaqq, l-irġiel Musulmani u n-nisa Musulmani, il-nisa jemmen irġiel u jemmen, l-irġiel ubbidjenti u n-nisa ubbidjenti, l-irġiel veritiera u n-nisa veritiera, l-irġiel pazjent u n-nisa ta 'pazjenti, l-irġiel umli u n-nisa umli, l-irġiel karità u n-nisa karità

trans-unit.source: It is not for a believing man or a believing woman, when Allah and His Messenger have decided a matter, that they should [thereafter] have any choice about their affair. And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger has certainly strayed into clear error.
trans-unit.target: Mhuwiex għal bniedem jemmen jew mara jemmen, meta Allah u Messenger Tiegħu iddeċidew kwistjoni, li huma għandhom [wara] l-ebda għażla dwar affari tagħhom.

trans-unit.source: And [remember, O Muhammad], when you said to the one on whom Allah bestowed favor and you bestowed favor, "Keep your wife and fear Allah," while you concealed within yourself that which Allah is to disclose. And you feared the people, while Allah has more right that you fear Him. So when Zayd had no longer any need for her, We married her to you in order that there not be upon the believers any discomfort concerning the wives of their adopted sons when they no longer have need of them. And ever is the command of Allah accomplished.
trans-unit.target: U [ftakar, O Muhammad], meta inti qal li l-waħda li lilha Allah octroyé favur u inti octroyé favur, "Żomm mara tiegħek u biża Allah," filwaqt li inti moħbija ġewwa lilek innifsek li fih Alla huwa li jiżvelaw.
